name: Your Cattle
summary: An interactive casual game. By utilizing mechanics such as charging, knocking back, stunning, and blink, players can hone their skills in a low-pressure environment.Accompanied by exquisite music and smooth interactions, relieve emotional stress.

name: Your Sister's Drown'd, Laertes
summary:
Your Sister's Drown'd, Laertes is a feverdream for at least four people. one of you will play ophelia, while the others decide who ophelia was and what she meant to them.

in some ways, it is a game about grief.

in another way, it is an examination of the manic pixie dream girl, and how there is a real person behind that title.

it is heavily inspired by hamlet act v, scene i, in which hamlet and laertes leap into the open grave of ophelia to fight over who loved her more.

name: You're Just Imagining It
summary:
a chronic illness simulation game.

you think you have a chronic illness, but you don't know what. all you know is you are always in some state of pain. you've been to too many doctors to count... but you still have to live your life.

how long will it take for you to get a diagnosis?

name: You Die Today
summary: Combine deck-building and dice-rolling in this tabletop-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler! Roll D4s, D6s, D20s, and more to activate powerful card abilities and conquer dynamic encounters.

name: Yomifuda: Kanji Survivors
summary: Your path to survival is written in ink! Survive the endless Yokai onslaught with the power of language. Yomifuda combines rogue-lite action with a Japanese learning system featuring over 1,000 essential Kanji. Build your vocabulary, and unlock powers to devastate the evils of the underworld.

name: You and I, at the End of That Summer
summary: Having lost the meaning of life, Shionagi meets Ayana, who suffers from a certain illness. “Kidnap me from this boring everyday life.” He wishes to die. A girl promised death. A bittersweet summer kidnapping drama where they confront each other's “lives.”

name: Yolked
summary: The Great Egg-Scape! Yolked is a kinetic, physics-based platforming romp where you take control of an anthropomorphic egg as it emancipates itself from one perilous predicament to the next! Climb, mantle, & swing past all sorts of environmental hazards & dastardly dangers as your fellow eggs cheer you on!

name: Yo-Kai Watch: Puni-Puni
summary:
Free-to-play puzzle role-playing game for the iOS and Android. Stylistically similar to the game Disney Tsum Tsum, the Yo-kai take the form of a gummy (called puni in Japanese or wib wob in English) and the player matches them during gameplay.
It was also released in English and other languages worldwide, with the name Yo-kai Watch: Wibble Wobble, but that version was discontinued in 2018. The original Japanese version of Puni Puni is still receiving updates, celebrating it's 8th anniversary in 2023.

name: You're Watching Icebox!
summary:
You're watching Icebox! The coolest show on the box. I'm your host Reggie Plunkett, and have we got a show for you.

You'll have to try to keep your cool in this point and click adventure, as you host a disastrous episode of failing 80's variety show, Icebox!

name: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijoushugi no Kyoushitu he: Merge Puzzle Tokubetsu Shiken
summary:
Experience the story of the "Yomi" anime with the easy-to-use and addictive "Merge Puzzle"!
There are no difficult operations to advance the game! Combine various objects and clear the mission!
The side scenario also features a behind-the-scenes story that is not depicted in the anime!

name: You Don't Know Jack Television
summary: If you thought all those hours of watching TV were good for nothing, then You Don't Know Jack… Television! With more categories than your local cable provider, You Don't Know Jack Television spans over 50 years of boob-tube trivia, from Ralph Kramden to the guy on “King of Queens” who looks like Ralph Kramden. So set down the remote and put your recliner in the upright and locked position… it's You Don't Know Jack Television

name: You Don't Know Jack Sports
summary: Think you know everything about football, basketball, baseball, or hockey? How about tennis, volleyball, golf, or lawn darts? Then light up the scoreboard with You Don't Know Jack Sports, YDKJ all hopped up on 'roids! So put in your mouthguard, adjust your cup, and get ready. Play ball… er, trivia!

name: Yousei Daisensou: Touhou Sangetsusei
summary: The 12.8th game in the Touhou Project, which focuses on freezing bullets rather than dodging them.

name: Yoshi Tanks Kawaii
summary: In Yoshi Tanks Kawaii, play as up to six different Yoshi Tank Girls and use a variety of different powerups as you fire away at your opponents in this multiplayer turn-based artillery game, whether they be your friends, or AI controlled!

name: Yokai Tales
summary: A Roguelite JRPG set in Japanese folklore, where you can transform into your enemies!

name: Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet
summary: I've been h4ving these dreams la7ely. They can't be real...8ut what if they are? I close my eyes and I see her fac3. Follow Locke as he tries to discover the secrets of Yoko in this point and click, cyberpunk noir adventure.

name: YogLabs: Testing Initiative
summary: A unique puzzle-adventure set in the secret YogLabs research facility. As a newly created clone, you’ll face a series of challenges while disaster threatens to consume the laboratory.

name: Your Canvas
summary: Your Canvas is a Text-Based Psychological Horror game set during three therapy sessions with different time periods where the player will be presented with various choices for deciding the outcome of the story.

name: You Will Select a Decision
summary: A pair of knock-off Choose Your Own Adventure books from Soviet-era Kyrgyzstan, newly declassified by the CIA.

name: Your Anime Waifu
summary: Slide image parts to their correct positions to be rewarded with complete images. Enjoy and appreciate tasteful art pieces in a gallery at your own pace.

name: Your Voice in the Autumn Leaves
summary: After his girlfriend Kaori broke up with him, 17 year old student Kure isolated himself from the world, spending his time home, heartbroken, listening to sad indie songs and playing videogames. Then, one day, outside the Hospital where his mother works, Kure met someone very special: a girl named Autumn, who has been diagnosed with cancer and is trying to assimilate her situation. That day would change their lives forever...

name: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator
summary: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator is a 2D game with a lot of mechanics. It is always exhausting to look for apartment, but fortune is at your side now! Welcome your new roommate, Yoshima! Can you find the key to her heart? Don't forget to pay the rent!

name: You Are Peter Shorts
summary: You are Peter Shorts! You have been captured and taken to a secret cloning facility. Can you escape with your newly-cloned brethren?

name: Yomi Domini
summary: Yomi Domini is an action-adventure game that tracks your tendencies while progressing through the level. The info gathered can be used against you or fight you on your own level depending on your difficulty selection.

name: Yo-Kai Watch 2: Fleshy Souls
summary: Watch out! The strangely charming troublemakers, Yo-kai, are back for an all-new adventure! Find, befriend, and battle more than 350 new and returning Yo-kai. Hop on a train to seek out new towns and new Yo-kai. Teaming up with the heroic cat, Hovernyan, travel back in time to save Springdale, and witness the origin of the Yo-kai Watch!

name: You Are Mine 2
summary:
Part 2 of the popular love story has finally arrived!

In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options as to how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Youchosis
summary: Overshadowed by multiple Psychosis, you play as Keith as he overdoses and shift through realms looking for the "perfect afterlife" all from his mind and psychological view on reality.

name: Yo, Matias 2: Fantasmas y Calabazas
summary: Second installment of the Yo, Matías videogame series. A Side-scroller halloween-themed platformer

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Change set "Beach! in Numazu!!"
summary: Let's change into a perfect swimsuit this summer and adventure in the mirror world!

name: Yougekitai: Jashin Koumaroku
summary:
As the newest member of a paranormal detective group operating in the greater Tokyo area, it's your responsibility to help keep modern-day Japan safe from demons, monsters, ghosts, and various mythological figures. Manage your coworkers' schedules to conduct research & development, investigate reports of local anomalies, and venture out to fight and detain evildoers. Succeed at these tasks and you might come closer to solving the mysteries and conspiracy behind this earthly invasion!

Yougekitai is a 1993 Telenet DRPG/strategic simulation game where you run an agency of professionals tracking and containing dangerous entities in bubble-era Japan. The game switches between your headquarters, where you oversee day-to-day operations, and dungeons where you & your party fight enemies and explore for items or information. Character abilities range in exploration and combat, from forensics to ESP powers. While the game's story has a set cast, your selection of team members is randomized upon starting a new game, and mission choices also get semi-randomized per playthrough.

name: Your Move
summary: Your Move is a multiplayer game shaped by the Cozy Cabin community. Work together with other players to try to survive in an eerie forest, where every shadow hides a secret and every sound could mean danger.

name: Yo! Noid Was Ahead of its Time
You Are the Castle
summary: An Xbox Live Indie Game

name: Your Weight
summary: Your Weight is a simulation game that turns weight loss into a series of decision-based scenarios. Players manage their character's journey through weight loss by making lifestyle choices, with game mechanics centered around health and fitness decisions that affect the character's progress toward their goal.

name: Yoiyami Dreamer: Voice of the Dreambringer
summary: Yoiyami Dreamer is a 2D fixed screen heartful action game, developed and published by tripper room, which was released in Japan in 2015.

name: Yoshiwara Higanbana
summary: --Whether I end up after falling in love, in your arms or in a scarlet prison? It's up to you to make my vow of higanbana fall or wither-- Even if it's only for one night, I want to be held by you...

name: Yoot Tower
summary:
Build a profitable and unique tower block complete with various amenities and living accommodations, whilst balancing the needs of the occupants.
Lead designer, Yoot Saito, who also worked on SimTower, brings this game as a sequel to SimTower, adding several new features while retaining the same general interface and style. The game's premise is largely similar to its predecessor.

name: Yooka-Laylee: Buddy Duo Pack
summary:
Yooka-Laylee is an open-world platform adventure from genre veterans. Embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair is a new 2D platform adventure from some of the key creative talent behind 'Donkey Kong Country'.

name: Yo, Matias 4: Viajero del Tiempo
summary: Fourth installment of the Yo, Matías comic stripe videogame series. A side scroller platformer travelling through different time periods.

name: You Have 10 Seconds
summary: You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade style platformer game with over 40 levels.

name: Yongjiang River
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair Digital Deluxe Version includes:
Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair - Yooka & Laylee are back in a brand-new platform adventure from Playtonic Games!
Yooka-Laylee and the Kracklestone - an officialy-licenced 117-page graphic novel based on the characters and world of Yooka-Laylee.
Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair Original Soundtrack
Trowzer's Top Tonic Pack - With this pack of top tonics, players will have even more choice when customising the way they play!

name: You Don't Know Jack vol. 4 The Ride
summary: For the fourth volume of the CD-Rom trivia game show, the You Don't Know Jack crew decided to throw out the YDKJ rule book and start fresh! This ain't your daddy’s You Don't Know Jack! Suffice to say, you can take any preconceived notions you've had about the series and chuck 'em down an open elevator shaft because volume 4 is going to take you on the ride of your life!

name: Yoga Master
summary:
Yoga Master is the first wellness game of its kind built entirely in 3D and designed by experts to help you reach the perfect balance between mind and body.
Thanks to the collaboration of international professional yoga coaches, Yoga Master is the first wellness game of its kind built entirely in 3D and designed by experts to help you reach the perfect balance between mind and body.

With a wide range of programs, lessons and more than 150 poses from classic to urban yoga, you'll be mentored by a coach who will accurately show you exercises step by step, performing them with you.

name: Your Second Wife
summary: Think you've had your fill of virtual waifu? It's Okay, step into the world of Your Other Waifu... She's developed a passion for dress-up and is waiting for you to join her in some delightful little games!

name: You Only Livez Twice
summary: A Multiplayer Zombie Apocalypse Survival Game

name: You Make The Game
summary: Alien's Fridge is a 2D roguelike horror physics-based platformer where you step into the shoes of a brave boy scout trapped in a cave infested with ravenous aliens. Fight for your survival as you gather crucial upgrades and face a formidable final boss in this relentless battle.

name: Yogho Yogho spel
summary: Yogho Yogho spel is a platform game where the player takes the role of a boy who likes the Dutch yoghurt drink Yogho Yogho. In every level the protagonist has to find one or more objects and bring them to someone or something. Bonus levels full of fruits can be played in between to help the player reach a higher score. Lives come in the form of dreams and hit points can be replenished by drinking a glass of Yogho. Locked doors can be unlocked with keys found around the map.

name: Your Butt
summary:
This is a 2048-style game. Use the arrow keys or WASD to slide the pictures, combine two identical pictures into a more advanced picture to get points, and try to get a higher score before filling the entire board!

There are also different styles of patterns to use in the game, each with different background music.

name: Youtubers Life 2
summary: Become the trendiest youtuber in the world and live your dream. Make friends, deal with rivals, attend events, film and edit videos, and share it all !! Fame, Fortune and Fans are waiting for you.

name: You Have 10 Seconds 2
summary: You Have 10 Seconds 2 is the sequel to the popular Free to Play game "You Have 10 Seconds". You have 10 seconds to get from the start of each level to the end before time runs out and without dying.

name: You Don't Know Jack Movies
summary:
You Don't Know Jack Movies is considered the most challenging game in the series. Are you up for the challenge? Test your movie knowledge from back when movies were movies, and movie candy didn't have high fructose corn syrup!

The game covers everything from Fred Astaire to Freddy Krueger, and all the Freds in between. With all the irreverence, humor and style of the original You Don't Know Jack, Movies will have moviegoers rolling in the sticky aisles.

name: Yo-Kai Watch Blasters: Moon Rabbit Crew
summary: The third installment of Yo-Kai Watch Busters that was released as a free DLC expansion for both release versions of the game, Red Cat Squad and White Dog Corps.

name: You Will Thank Me as Fast as You Thank a Werewolf
summary: This work is a collaboration with GPT-2, a neural network model designed to predict the next word in a block of given text based on its study of eight million web pages. In this application, I input a text file of my own prose from the past twenty years into GPT-2. It then generated new writing in a similar style. I selected, arranged, and lightly edited the resulting output.

name: Yokai Dungeon
summary: Yokai have just interrupted the lantern festival, it's up to Tanuki and his friends to save the day. Push blocks to crush the pesky yokai, explore randomly generated dungeons, and dive into beatiful Japanese folklore.

name: Yo-kai Watch Busters 2: Hihou Densetsu Bambalaya Sword
summary:
In Yo-kai Watch Busters 2: Hihou Densetsu Bambalaya Sword, players are led to Karakuri Island by the great adventurer Indy J, where it is said that the treasure of a pirate king rests. The “Brandory Family,” strong rivals and heinous thieves who have served a total of 10,000 years in prison, are also after the treasure.

New treasure yo-kai such as Narcis 2-Sei, Ancordead, Madomoaizel, Zapdokia, Doescalibur, and Rosetta Stone will appear. By using new weapons called “Treasure Gear,” which come in forms such as the “Magnum” gun, “Tune Sword,” and “Sniper” gun, you can make your way to the treasure with greater advantage. There are also item boxes that can’t be destroyed unless a Treasure Gear is used. Four-player multiplayer is also supported.

name: Yoshi
summary: Yoshi is a puzzle game featuring the titular character. In this game, the player must stack two of the same Mario enemy on top of one another to clear them. The concept of the game was inspired by Tetris.

name: Your Diary+
summary: Your Diary + is a visual novel game that explores the seven ways humans experience happiness in the stories of its seven heroines. What does it mean to be useful to someone? To be loved? To trust someone with your heart? Rediscover the importance of these everyday joys.

name: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark
summary: Another chapter of the atmospheric horror series has emerged from the shadows! Eerie sound design and shadowy environments set the stage for gruesome and terrifying ghosts never seen before in the series.

name: Yorigami Market
summary:
This game is a derivative work of Touhou Project.
In short, it is a short RPG in which HP has been replaced by money.

name: You Don't Know Jack
summary: You Don't Know Jack is where high culture and pop culture collide! Loaded with outrageous questions, wall-to-wall music and sound effects, blistering humor, and Cookie Masterson, your semi-lovable master of ceremonies, You Don't Know Jack is trivia-licious!

name: Yolanda: The Ultimate Challenge
summary:
A notoriously difficult platformer for Amiga and Atari ST, where you take the part of Yolanda, offspring of the mighty Hercules himself, cursed by Hera.

There are twelve tasks to complete and a trainer level, over fifty levels randomly selected. The player may have to play up to five screens to complete a task. The twelth task can only be played if you have completed the first eleven tasks.

name: Yo-Ho Kablammo
summary: Immerse yourself in the fully 3D pirate world of Yo-Ho Kablammo. Master your vessel and take to the seas in this frantic action-packed game. Blast your foes with cannon fire, collect numerous power-ups to give you the upper hand, and collect the spoils of your victory. Set your sails and navigate a variety of ships all with unique playing styles. Play the single player challenges or battle your friends in multiplayer madness online and offline, to show who the true pirate is. Only one can survive in these ruthless times, will it be you? Your ship awaits, captain.

name: Yomi
summary: Yomi is a fighting game in card form. Learn your character, practice combos, and read the opponent's tendencies. 10 characters to choose from, plus 10 more expansion characters available for purchase inside the app.

name: YouTD 2
summary: YouTD 2 is a remake of the tower defense custom map "YouTD" from Warcraft III (original mod created by geX and the YouTD community).

name: You Have To Climb Out
summary: A short puzzle/story game about a frog who has fallen into a cave after digging too deep

name: Yoiyami Densetsu: The Legend of Twilight
summary: Yoiyami Densetsu: The Legend of Twilight is a fan-made Touhou Project 2D action-adventure game developed by Otter's Arcadia, featuring Rumia as the protagonist.

name: Yokai's Secret
summary: "Yokai's Secret" is a decryption game with hot girls.

name: You Can't Save Her
summary:
You have three seconds to kill your former friend.

The nuns and sacred algorithms have willed it.

And no matter how much you want to save her, you can’t.

name: Youth Academy
summary: Youth Manager is an auto-battler football management simulation about developing young talents between the ages of 16 to 18. Your goal is to train wonderkids, help them sign professional contracts, and build your reputation as a top academy.

name: Your Diary
summary: Your Diary is a visual novel game that explores the seven ways humans experience happiness in the stories of its seven heroines. What does it mean to be useful to someone? To be loved? To trust someone with your heart? Rediscover the importance of these everyday joys.

name: YoWorld
summary: Originally created by the founders of Big Viking Games, YoWorld was sold to Zynga as YoVille in 2008, and later reacquired by Big Viking Games in 2014. YoWorld continues to thrive on the Facebook platform and is cited as one of the inspirations for the creation of FarmVille! The game allows Facebook members to create a virtual community with personalized characters and homes. With thousands of items to choose from, players can customize their homes, characters, and worlds to their heart’s content!

name: Yoshi Demo
summary: Yoshi Demo is a tech demo that appeared to be a Game Boy Advance port of Yoshi's Story. It is also commonly regarded as vaporware, though it is unknown Nintendo ever had any intentions of releasing it as a full game. The first version of the demo is completely mute, but the second version contains music and sound. The demo's ROM image can only be obtained within the Game Boy Advance SDK.

name: You're Not Actually Supposed To Die (At The Tournament Of Death)
summary:
You're stuck in a submarine with five ridicolously rich people. The submarine don't work good. What will you do?
I resisted the impulse of making this a dating sim btw. Which I should be praised for.
It's a game. I don't know what else to say about it. The bulk of it has been written while mildly sleep deprived.

name: Youtubers Life: OMG Edition
summary: The OMG Edition of Youtubers Life is the console version of the earlier PC release. The game features three "channels" for players to explore: Gaming, Music and cooking.

name: Yoshi's Cookie
summary: The Game Boy version of Yoshi's Cookie was released as part of a dual launch with the NES version of the game. While they both featured the original three forms of game play, individuals on Gameboy were at an advantage in the form of the amount of players that could compete against one another in the VS mode.

name: You're My Favorite Person
summary: Spend time with your new best friend! Have fun as it takes you through digital worlds to solve puzzles and collect Perfect Stars! After all, it knows what's best! It knows what's best! It knows what's best.

name: Yoru no Nai Kuni 2: Shingetsu no Hanayome - Premium Box
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Yoru no Nai Kuni 2 Shingetsu no Hanayome
Yoru no Nai Kuni 2 Visual Book
Yoru no Nai Kuni 2 Official Soundtrack
Character Poster
Special Character 3D Card
Character Card Set

name: You Are Ghost
summary:
You Are Ghost is a VR sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa!

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

name: Yojijukugo Flash
summary:
Yojijukugo Flash is a free mini Flash game provided by GAMEDESIGN. "Yojijukugo" is a Japanese idiom consisting of 4 kanji.
In each stage, some kanji are randomly placed. The goal is to construct Yojijukugo by rearranging them with a mouse in all 7 stages.

name: You Suck and I Hate You: Part 2
summary: cringe cotnrok stil; wants asnd indtednds to detstory the intenert and our heros want to stop them, for some reaosn. 180 levels of more projecitle dodging action!!!!!

name: Yoko & Yuki: Dr. Rat's Revenge
summary: Yoko & Yuki: Dr. Rat's Revenge is a family game suitable for kids of all ages. Yoko and Yuki are two adorable cats in love with each other. But the devious doctor Rat stole Yuki from Yoko. Now it’s time to do some cat business, using helpful gadgets and solve puzzles in order to save your girlfriend. Our hero is equipped with scissors to cut ropes, gravitron to flip the world and spray can to find hidden objects. Daring players would be handsomely rewarded for using their wits and helping two cats to achieve their happiness!

name: Your Forever Friend
summary: Your Forever Friend is the solution to never feeling alone again! Play video games, listen to music together, reminisce about buried memories... And there's absolutely nothing wrong with it. NOTHING ! <3

name: YouRiding: Surfing and Bodyboarding Game
summary: A realistic surfing and bodyboarding game. Play for the top spot of the ranking at real spots like Kirra in Australia or Supertubes in Portugal, create your own waves and share them to the community, or play against other players in 16 surfers bracket competitions.

name: Yo-kai Watch World
summary:
Augmented reality, location-based adventure game, where the player has to roam the real world to try to find and befriend Yo-kai. It was only playable if the player was physically in Japan.
In 2022, as the main game was discontinued, the app was transformed into "Yo-kai Watch World Memories", an app to see all the progress made in the main game, also serving as a medallium and photo app.

name: Yokai Mask
summary: Qiu Yue, the girl who has lost her childhood memories, wants to find out the truth by the only clue -- a fox mask. But she is trapped in a 50-years conspiracy when searching an old mask shop. All the truth is going to show by the adventure of Qiu Yue and two mates ...

name: You Don't Know Jack Vol. 3
summary: The spawning continues as the You Don't Know Jack series pumps out volume 3. Join your host Cookie ad he takes you on a trivia Tilt-a-Whirl that's a triple-dip of cheeky hip. YDKJ Volume 3 adds a whole slew of question types into a mind-bending mixture of smart-aleckiness and sassitude.

name: Yomegami: My Sweet Goddess
summary: "Yomegami: My Sweet Goddess!" is a lighthearted visual novel set in a fantasy world, developed by ALcot. It tells a love story about a demon reincarnation with a goddess mother, a mob boss's daughter, a clumsy class president, and a naive dog-eared girl in their daily lives.

name: You Can't See Ghosts!
summary: You Can't See Ghosts is a puzzle game about spatial awareness and deductive reasoning with a charming story where you play as an invisible ghost. Bump into walls, step on glass, and other clues to locate yourself and reach the exit. Perfect for both experienced players and newcomers alike.

name: Yoshitsune Densetsu
summary: Yoshitsune Densetsu is a cancelled action RPG that was in development around 1993, planned to be published by ASCII on the Super Famicom / SNES. The game told the fictionalized story of Minamoto no Yoshitsune a “military commander of the Minamoto clan of Japan, that after evading death made his way past Hokkaido and sailed to the mainland of Asia, re-surfacing as Genghis Khan“.

name: You Will Die Here Tonight
summary: Explore in top-down retro aesthetics and face the horrors of Breckenridge Hall in pulse-pounding first person combat. Scavenge for supplies, solve puzzles, and upgrade your gear. Do whatever it takes to survive, but remember: You Will Die Here Tonight.

name: Youkai Club
summary: Youkai Club is an Action game, developed by TOSE and published by Jaleco Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1987.

name: You Were Here Before
summary: You were here before. Don't you remember? Try to fix your photographs. How were they? What do they bring to mind?

name: Yoren
summary: Yoren is the first cutting-edge realistic VR magic game. Cast spells by drawing rune gestures, explore the openworld collecting crafting ingredients for potions and battle the numerous bosses of fallen kingdoms and dungeons in the world of Yoren.

name: You Will Fall
summary: You're standing on the roof of a building staring at the thin tightrope stretched taught over the wide expanse. Your one goal is to make it across. Only problem is, you will fall. It is inevitable. Good thing you have this voice inside your head to constantly remind you of your fate.

name: Your Magic Hook
summary: A light rogue-like casual game. Players fight enemies, mine for “minerals,” and gain upgrades to improve their stats. Between rounds, buy items to boost your character. Also includes an idle desktop pet mode—every keyboard or mouse input feeds your mushroom and helps it grow!

name: You Must Escape
summary: Your one and only mission in this room escaping puzzle game is to find the way to open different doors and exit each and every room the adventure has to offer.

name: You need to Buy a Phone Charger
summary: You need to buy a phone charger is a game about a struggling artist trying to buy a phone cable in a late-capitalist, enshittified-to-the-max, internet hellscape. Good luck!

name: Yoshi's Strange Quest
summary: This is the sequel to Mario's Strange Quest and a mod of Super Mario World.

name: Your Show Has Been Cancelled
summary: Your favorite show has been cancelled due to unbelievable circumstances. Take down foes who dare to get in your way in randomly-generated dungeon levels as you adventure to figure out what really happened and bring back your show!

name: You Can't Win This Game
summary: An experimental narrative tale that talks about how capitalism has corrupted dreams, using them as fuel to maintain the lie of effort culture. Overall, it shows how we normalize feeling miserable and even burning out just for a chance to have a future that might never come, in which we are happy.

name: Your Digital Cookbook
summary: An interactive cookbook, where you learn everything you need to know to cook food even if you've never been in a kitchen before. With our real life recipies and realistic execution of the steps you can both play the game for fun or play it as you cook the same recipie in real life.

name: You Don't Know Jack: 5th Dementia
summary: Jack is back. And this time he has the internet with him. For the first time in the long running series, you can play with your mates over the internet. There are 600 questions that must be answered and a new game type called Bug out, where little bugs fly onto the screen and mention a few words. If the words don't go with the clue, you must be the first to buzz in to splat the little guys. Other than that, this is the same Jack that we have (or haven't) known for some time.

name: Yo-Kai Watch Busters: Iron Oni Army
summary:
An arcade version of Yo-Kai Watch Busters.
It has an online account option to manage saved game information.
Yo-Kai cards and medals can be used to play that character in-game.

name: Your Body, an Altar
summary: A game made in Twine, based on the tabletop game of the same name.

name: Your Mom
summary: Your mom is here, come quickly to play happily with your mom.

name: Yoru no Majin to Ikusa no Kuni: Samayoeru Vampire
summary: Yoru no Majin to Ikusa no Kuni: Samayoeru Vampire is an Action game, developed and published by Poisoft, which was released in Japan in 2012.

name: Youda Farmer 2
summary: When the mayor calls for your assistance to fight Big Boss, your adventure to help the poor villagers starts by quickly gathering materials to rebuild the destroyed buildings. Rebuild your farm and the villagers’ favorite shops to recover from the evil tricks of a real estate developer trying to take over the nostalgic little village!

name: You Are Just a Blue Switch
You Are the Bomb: A Game About Rolling Bombs
summary: Collect coins, gems and gun powder, uncover secrets, and conquer epic bosses across time-based levels. Test your skills by mastering the rolling mechanics in this action-packed 3D platformer! Face dynamic environments, harness powerful abilities, and race to save the magical world of Boomerland!

name: Young Kong: The Myth of the Magic Throne
summary: In a fantasy kingdom where animals rule, the balance and unity of the valley has been destroyed after the loss of its magical throne.

name: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles
summary: Unwind and enjoy the slow life in Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles, a relaxing open-world adventure game. Yonder is set in the world of Gemea. A natural island paradise with eight distinct environments ranging from tropical beaches to snow-capped summits. Yonder offers a world to lose yourself in; a world filled with the wonder of discovery and the spirit of adventure.

name: You
summary: YOU is a story-rich open-world RPG set on a mystical island shattered by an ancient conflict between two brothers—one who served the gods through sacrifice, the other who resisted. After their fall, the island lies in ruins.

name: Your World
summary: Your World is a VR open-world survival game with building and crafting. Explore a stylized world, gather resources, and create your own unique world. Survive in the wilderness, manage resources, and expand your domain. Can you turn chaos into a thriving world?

name: Your, Endless Mind. Glava I: My
summary: Do you really want to know? You need to understand that there's no turning back. Here, every action you take has consequences. Do you think you know everything about yourself? I will prove to you, that that's not true. Are you ready? He's already waiting. Your, Endless Mind.

name: Yoyo Fighter
summary: Fight YoYo! The magic teleport will take you to a dangerous stone world in which you are going to experience unbelievable adventures full of dangers. Your only weapon is a little devil on the thread or how it is called more often - YoYo.

name: Yoobot Vs. Yoonot
summary: A flash game created by the British Heart Foundation in the late 2000s to help educate youth on how to have healthy habits.

name: Your Channel
summary: It's a Twitch Chat integrated Bullet Hell Game, where the Streamer Plays against the Chat. Periodically the Game will Request Patterns from the Chat to be Queued up in the Next waves of Patterns thrown against the Streamer. 2 Hits, and you're out!

name: Young Street
summary:
Before bipedal apes invented radio receivers, before we exchanged our gills for lungs, there was radio.
Man-made transmissions mutate and extend the electrosphere.

Remember the alien face of nature!

name: Your Judgement, Inquisitor
summary: Your judgment, Inquisitor Medieval Spain. You serve as an Inquisitor in the shadow of the dreaded Tomás de Torquemada. Cast out demons from the possessed. Burn heretics. Spare the innocent — or condemn them. Every wrong choice will bring you closer to the wrath of the Church… or the fury of the mob.

name: Yokai Landlord: Monster Mystery!
summary: A Werewolf game-style social deduction adventure where you play as the landlord of an apartment and try to uncover the Yokai hiding among your residents. Not just a mystery adventure, this is a heart-warming tale of character growth.

name: Yoostar on MTV
summary: Yoostar on MTV fulfills the dreams of pop culture fans and gamers alike by giving everyone the opportunity to star in the most iconic scenes to ever hit cable TV. With a huge library of live events, news, classic, reality, and original shows to choose from, as well as the inclusion of upcoming shows to maximize its cultural relevancy, the extensive archive of trend-setting and entertaining content leaves no stone unturned. Additionally, some of the most popular music videos in recent history will be playable in Yoostar on MTV, in which you can perform with your own voice or via lip dub.

name: Yogurt's Big Adventure
summary: Yogurt's Big Adventure is a VMU game released with Time Stalkers.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Yo-Kai Watch 3: Sushi
summary: Third game of the main series of Yo-kai Watch video games. It was initially released in two versions, Sushi and Tempura. The player switches control between 2 characters, one in Japan and the other in the USA.

name: Yoltrund
summary:
Lost in a world of fire, stone, and death, you must find your way to the Light in this 2D environmental RPG. Experience a gripping tale of the human Will as you traverse through Yoltrund, navigating the twisted and distorted mazes within. 
Will you return to Light or succumb to the Shadow?

name: Your Final Days
summary: A NES-Like action game where a small robot, Orb, has to venture through four locations to get stronger and fight the corruption, on a strict time limit, while paying extra attention to resource management.

name: Yoshi Joins Bowser
summary: After several years of being abused by Mario, Yoshi has decided it's time for him to get revenge. Help him to join the king of Koopas.

name: You Fall You Lose
summary: You fall you lose is a hardcore fun game created by an indie developer. Explore many biomes and even the outer space with your own customizable ball - give it a name!

name: Youda Sushi Chef
summary: Quickly serve sushi-hungry customers the right dishes to slowly build up a restaurant empire! Use memory and skills to create the right pieces of Asian cuisine. Become everyone's favorite sushi chef by decorating your restaurant, performing knife tricks or serving some sake to waiting customers. Stay focused to reach your daily targets even when reservations and takeaway orders might distract you. Keep the sushi coming to earn nice bonuses and extra money.

name: You Sure Wanna Drink This?
summary: Dive into a whimsical turn-based RPG where logic meets alchemy! When a mysterious force steals all potion-making knowledge, you’ll master remedies on the fly! Analyze bizarre ingredients, reverse-engineer their effects, and craft tactical potions to outsmart enemies.

name: Youtubers Life
summary: Youtubers Life is the ultimate vlogger tycoon/life-sim videogame. The main aim of this title is to become the world’s greatest youtuber in history. To achieve it, you will have to edit videos, get in touch with other video bloggers and try that fame doesn’t overload you. Create your own online video channel and upload videos to increase your fanbase, but keep an eye on your daily tasks while you don’t lose track of your social life! You'll have to deal with fans, friends, family and time management! Increase your popularity so you can move to a new place and manage your own video content creators network company.

name: Your Majesty's Arrival
summary: A high-simulation emperor simulation game with a real game timeline. From the first perspective of the simulated emperor's accession to the throne, he governs the government, manages officials and concubines, raises children, conquers the world, and experiences the life of an emperor.

name: Yotsume God: Reunion
summary: In September of my third year in junior high school, I went with my father to my grandparents' house in the mountains. The place we arrived at was Yotsu Village. It was a small village that had long believed in "Yotsume God". There I meet a mysterious boy.

name: Yo-Kai Watch 3: Sushi/Tempura Busters T Pack
summary:
Yo-kai Watch 3 is a two-part game series from the third generation of the Yo-kai Watch series, exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS developed and published by Level-5.
Originally released in 2 versions, Sushi and Tempura were bundled together as the Sushi/Tempura Busters T [Treasure] Pack, to coincide with the release of the 3rd version, Sukiyaki, and the 2.0 update that added the Busters T game mode.

name: Yo, Matias 3: Cazador de Golosinas
summary: The third installment in the Yo, Matías stripe cartoon videogame series. A puzzle-solving platformer where Matias collects candies and fighting enemies.

name: Yoshi's Island
summary: The remake of Yoshi's Island included in Super Mario Advance 3.

name: Your Friend Wiggles
summary: In this terrifying walking simulator, you will meet those virtual pets you once forgot in a drawer, and who now seek revenge, in an atmosphere full of mystery and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

name: Youtubers Life 3: Stream Together!
summary: Reach the top of the rankings! Create your dream home with a luxury setup, compete online in real-time with other users by streaming, creating VODs, and editing them in the most epic way… and don't forget to share your photos in the unique and time-limited events on your calendar!

name: Youchien Gaiden: Kareinaru Casino Club - Double Draw
summary:
In modern English a casino is a facility that houses and accommodates certain types of gambling activities. Casinos are most commonly built near or combined with hotels, restaurants, retail shopping, cruise ships and other tourist attractions. Some casinos are known for hosting live entertainment events, such as stand-up comedy, concerts, and sporting events. Use in the past, and modern use in other countries, does not necessarily involve gambling.

Customers gamble by playing games of chance, in some cases with an element of skill, such as craps, roulette, baccarat, blackjack, poker, and slot machines. Most games played have mathematically-determined odds that ensure the house has at all times an advantage over the players. This can be expressed more precisely by the notion of expected value, which is uniformly negative (from the player's perspective). This advantage is called the house edge. In games such as poker where players play against each other, the house takes a commission called the rake. Casinos sometimes give out complimentary items to gamblers.

Youchien Gaiden Kareinaru Casino Club - Double Draw is a gambling game that features Roulette, Baccarat, Blackjack, Gunshooting, Racing, etc.

name: Your Memories Off: Girl's Style
summary: Your Memory's Off: Girl's Style is PSP and PS2 visual novel. Unlike most Memories Off games, this is an otome game with female protagonist.

name: Yokai Busters
summary: Yokai Busters is an indie fantasy J-RPG featuring a diverse cast of female characters. You'll find a police officer, a caring mom, a shrine maiden, and more! Explore the maps and have a blast battling with your favorite Japanese girls, and Yokai!

name: You Used to be Someone
summary:
You have no idea how long it's been since you last set foot outside your cramped little apartment. You don't really talk to anyone. You can't focus on work. You barely have any appetite to speak of, literally and figuratively. Even casually reading Twitter makes you anxious.

Somehow, you thought moving to a new city would help you meet people you actually like. That you'd find fun activities to do and better opportunities all around. You used to be pretty good at faking your way around being a social butterfly. People actually seemed to like you, and the stuff you made and performed. But now? You can't even remember being that person.

Maybe you should go outside. Maybe it will help.

name: Yorvik's Game
summary: An atmospheric tabletop game with elements of deckbuilding and a narrative puzzle to solve

name: You and the Night
summary: You are traveling alone - just you, your broken car, the fog and the dull countryside. You are tired and you take a break in a small family hotel. You're engulfed in silence - you sit and wait like you always did - it's just you and the night.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the DeepBlue
summary: Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the DeepBlue is an official spin-off of Love Live! Sunshine. Yohane's fantasy world sets the stage for a 2D metroidvania in "Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the Deepblue"!

name: Your Android
summary: Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.

name: Yooka-Laylee
summary: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet (and beat) an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of shiny collectibles as buddy-duo Yooka (the green one) and Laylee (the wisecracking bat with the big nose) embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B and his devious scheme to absorb all the world’s books… and convert them into pure profit!

name: Yora Adventures
summary: Yora Adventures is the smart Tabletop RPG on your mobile device. Use integrated maps, clean adventure text sections, interactive character sheets and connected devices to experience your next game session in a new way - for players and game masters! Why don't you let your mobile phone do all the tiresome work and focus on what pen and paper gaming is about: immersive adventures through rich interactions!

name: You're Boned
summary:
A powerful psychic meets his end, and loses his body! Even so, he's not out for the count yet. Stranded in Hell, all he can do is fight his way out - and even with his psychic powers that's easier said than done!

You're Boned is a top-down roguelike shooter where you're a psychic skull trying to take out the underworld and re-earn your spot among the living!

name: Young Justice: Legacy
summary: The Nintendo 3DS port of Young Justice: Legacy, a multiplayer action RPG based on the Young Justice TV series.

name: Yoyo's Puzzle Park
summary: YoYo's Puzzle Park (released as "Gussun Paradise" in Japan) is a puzzle platform game featuring some sixty platform-filled levels similar to Bubble Bobble. The player (as Guss or Yodie) can hop around on them, while avoiding the enemies that crowd the platforms. ... In the multi-player mode, you can fight against your friends in a two-player deathmatch game.

name: Yoshimoto Mahjong Club
summary: Yoshimoto Mahjong Club is a comedy-themed mahjong game featuring 26 real-life comedians from talent agency Yoshimoto Kogyo, based on a TV show that ran on SUN-TV between 1997 and 1999. The featured stars are all represented both in live-action video clips and fully-3D in-game models, including voice clips of their signature quips. There is a standard free battle mode, as well as a tournament mode with 16 different titles to win. Winning tournaments will earn money, which is needed to enter and participate in the more advanced tournaments. The PlayStation Deluxe version adds a video gallery mode but is otherwise the same game.

name: Yoshi's Safari
summary: Yoshi's Safari is the first and so far the only dedicated rail shooting game in the Mario franchise, and one of the few games to use the SNES's Super Scope light gun peripheral. Gameplay consists of shooting enemies before they attack. There are bosses along the way that must be destroyed before players can move on to the next area.

name: Your Takeout
summary: Due to financial difficulties, you’ve taken a part-time job delivering takeout. Some orders seem unusual. Stay alert, distinguish between what’s normal and what’s not, and deliver the orders on time — or just escape.

name: Yo-kai Watch 3: Sukiyaki
summary: Updated 3rd version of Sushi and Tempura that was released exclusively in Japan, and was the basis for the international releases of Yo-kai Watch 3. It introduces new yokai to befriend and a complete new Yo-Kai Watch Busters side mode called Busters T. In that mode the player can go out and find hidden treasures in Egyptian or temple-themed dungeons and fight against giant Boss Yo-kai.

name: You Only Live Once
summary: A game about an unlikely hero who has a single chance to rescue his girlfriend from an evil lizard.

name: You've Got a Package
summary: You are a young and talented writer. One evening, someone leaves a mysterious box on your doorstep. What's inside will turn your life into a living nightmare...

name: Yoshitsune-ki
summary: Yoshitsune-ki is a historical action game released by Banpresto on December 1, 2005 for the PS2 and was Developed by Dream Factory . The game is known for having Popular Manga artist Takeshi Obata in charge of character design. The game takes place in the late Heian period to the early Kamakura period when Minamoto no Yoshitsune was active . While controlling the main character Yoshitsune, he fights monsters and the Heike with his companions, and aims to destroy the Heike by making full use of various swordsmanship in places such as Heiankyo, Hiraizumi , and Dannoura .

name: You, Me and Empty Words
summary: A story about Shintarou, an average student, and his best friend Akino.

name: Young Detectives: School
summary: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Yomawari: Night Alone - Digital Pitch Dark Edition
Your Call
summary: A short visual novel about making an important call.

name: Yo, Matias 6: Contra los Ciber Robots
summary: Sixth installment on the Yo, Matías comic strip videogame series. A side-scroller platform ambiented on the sci-fi cibernetic world.

name: Your Price, Your Honor.
summary: “Your Price, Your Honor.” is a game where you control the choices of a judge who is getting close to retirement. You must manage the public’s tolerance for injustice… and your own wallet.

name: You Were Just Selling Lemonade
summary: You Were Just Selling Lemonade is a strategy simulation game about selling lemonade in a capitalist society and the consequences that your actions may bring.

name: You Shall Not Break!
summary: Are you ready for some serious clicking? You Shall Not Break! is the ultimate clicker/arcade game. Make your way through 16 levels in 4 different environments and show you are the best! Prepare for moments of excitement, tears, anger, not to mention finger cramps!

name: Youda Survivor 2
summary: Survive an exotic adventure as you work together with a friendly tribe to find a missing talisman! Fight off pirates, harness some magic yourself and be the hero. As you meet exotic creatures, learn new potion recipes and explore caves for hidden treasure, equip yourself with magical tribal marks to improve your chance of survival.

name: Yoshi and the Mysterious Book
summary:
Join Yoshi for a new adventure in Yoshi and the Mysterious Book, launching on Nintendo Switch 2 in spring 2026.

One day, on the island where Yoshi and his friends live, a peculiar talking book named Mr. E suddenly falls from the sky. This peculiar book’s pages contain information about unusual creatures, so Yoshi decides to jump in and help investigate!

As Yoshi wanders through the book, you'll make all sorts of discoveries about the creatures you find and those discoveries will be written down. You'll find lots of unusual creatures residing within the book – a page-turning adventure awaits!

name: You Can Buy Every Upgrade
summary: A tiny 1-bit platformer metroidvania where you can buy every upgrade.

name: Yoake Mae yori Ruri-iro na: Brighter than Dawning Blue
summary:
The story is set in very distant future, in a time when mankind is just recovering from decades of war fought between Earth and a terraformed Moon. The war was so devastating that it set technological progress back by decades if not centuries, which is why the settings don’t look futuristic. Although the world is now at peace, there continues to be distrust between the Sphere Kingdom (Moon) and the Earth Federation. Travel between the two is restricted for diplomatic purposes and confined to a single spaceport on Earth.

So anyway, one day the lunar princess, Feena fam Earthlight, comes to the protagonist’s house for home stay…

name: Yoko no Hanashi
summary: Yoko no Hanashi is a first-person survival horror game where you need to survive in an abandoned college with one of your chosen yandere: Yoto (male version) and Yoko (female version)

name: Yoshimi Yahtzee
summary: Dice game for Playdate console

name: Yogi Bear: Great Balloon Blast
summary:
North American GBC Port of "Pop'n Pop", repurposed with the Yogi Bear license.

In the addictive, balloon-bursting tradition of POP 'N POP and BUST-A-MOVE comes YOGI BEAR: Great Balloon Blast from Taito and Bam Entertainment. Jellystone Park is holding a Balloon Fest and Yogi Bear (that's you!) knows this is the perfect opportunity to grab hold of some delicious picnic baskets. But first you need to clear the skies of a ton of fast-moving, falling balloons. Guide Yogi across the bottom of the screen, sending balloons shooting upwards from your special picnic basket. The object is to align three balloons of the same color together. When you do, all three pop and disappear, your score goes up, and more balloons drop down. Clear the whole stack before they reach the ground or it's game over. If you're quick and clever, you can cause high-scoring chain reaction explosions that will make your job a little easier. When you feel ready, you can go head-to-head against a friend in Link cable mode. YOGI BEAR: Great Balloon Blast is Cartoon Network-licensed, party-popping fun for your Game Boy Color.

name: Youjuu Kikou-hei WerDragon
summary:
Following the disappearance of S-City under a wave of dark and stormy clouds, the Roland Federation sends their elite troops to investigate and return order, only to become prey for the now mutated inhabitants. Kai Karze, the lone survivor, finds himself besieged on all sides, and even he's begun to transform into a demonic being the longer he fights. He must quickly locate and destroy the evil force transforming him and the city into this nightmare realm before it's too late.

WerDragon is an auto side-scrolling, stage-based action platformer with character growth and a dark science-fantasy setting. Kai will level up once you've destroyed enough enemies, gaining extra health and new abilities in the process. There are a few extra weapons to collect, devilish boss fights to survive, and many richly animated levels and cutscenes to enjoy.

name: Your Merman Boyfriend
summary: Meet your merman boyfriend.

name: Yo-Kai Dictionary
summary:
Yo-kai Daijiten (translated as Yo-Kai Dictionary or Yo-Kai Medallium) was a planned spin-off application first unveiled in 2015. It was officially canceled in 2021.
It was part quiz-RPG, where the player could answer questions based on Yo-kai in the form of a battle. And part compendium, where the player could read up facts about different Yo-kai.

name: Yoshi no Cookie
summary: Yoshi no Cookie is a remake of Yoshi's Cookie, only released inside the Nintendo Puzzle Collection for the Nintendo GameCube, only released in Japan.

name: Yooka-Laylee: Deluxe Edition
summary: Yooka-Laylee Digital Deluxe is the ultimate platforming package, including an exclusive digital manual and art book, plus the game’s incredible soundtrack!

name: Your Phone Dies in 20 Seconds
summary: You have 20 seconds to determine your fate.

name: Yo! Noid
summary: Yo! Noid, known is a 2D action platform game developed by Now Production and published by Capcom for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The game was first released in Japan as Kamen no Ninja Hanamaru on March 16, 1990 and was localized in the United States to promote the Noid, the claymation mascot of Domino's Pizza in the late 1980s. The game is also released as part of Nintendo's PlayChoice-10 series and featured in the Japanese TV show GameCenter CX.

name: You Are Dead!
summary: You see yourself as the only survivor of an unsuccessful cultist ritual on an isolated cabin, now there only exists you, your shotgun and hundreds of demons, however an unknown creature wants to test your luck, for good or ill, use what he gives you to modify yourself and your enemies!

name: YouTube: Missile Command
summary:
A removed YouTube Easter egg game based on the Arcade game "Missile command" which was featured on the site in 2013.

The game would appear when you typed "1337" or "1980" in any video of the time, Turret will appear and starting shooting on missiles

name: You Stole My Heart!
summary: An indie freeware visual novel with the goal of romancing the thief that broke into the protagonist's house. Includes multiple choices that can lead to one of seven endings depending on the player's choices.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional character pack vol.3 "Riko & Mari + Yohane"
summary:
Additional character pack Vol.3 "Riko & Mari + Yohane" includes the following:

1. Added playable character "Riko, Mari"
2. New story "Riko, Mari"
3. New initial charm "Nightwicked Lily, Nightwicked Mari, Fledgling Yohane"
4. New summoning card "Mirage Shield"
5. Yohane's new costume "Astrologer"

name: Your Turn To Die: Chapter 1, Part One
summary: Chapter 1, Part One is the first part of "Your Turn To Die: Death Game by Majority". It was originally released on NicoNico on August 28, 2017.

name: Your Turn To Die: Chapter 2, Part Two
summary:
Chapter 2, Part Two is the fourth part of Your Turn to Die: Death Game By Majority. It was originally released on NicoNico on May 21, 2019.
On May 31st 2019, an English fan translation for it and all previous chapters would be released by VGpersons, which would later go on to be endorsed as official by Nankidai.

name: Your Turn To Die: Chapter 1, Part Two
summary: Chapter 1, Part Two is the second part of Your Turn to Die: Death Game By Majority. It was originally released on NicoNico on January 31, 2018.

name: You. Me. Hell.
summary:
One boy. One girl. Two things in common: they are both trapped in their personal hells, and they want to get out.

"You. Me. Hell." is a classic crazy point-and-click-adventure and interactive story, with two playable protagonists. Tova and Tor have a shaky relationship. Tor lives in the future and in his own made-up-past. Tova is irritable, aggressive and dangerous to herself and every one else.

"You. Me. Hell." is not a game about saving the world. It's a game about a relationship, about how things can go wrong, and how they can be set right again.

name: Yoshi in Sonic the Hedgehog 2
summary: Yoshi in Sonic 2 is a ROMhack/mod of Sonic The Hedgehog 2. In this mod, the player controls Yoshi, with his signature moves from the Yoshi's Island series, like ground pounding, egg laying and throwing, enemy eating. Yoshi carries on his back a Baby Sonic and Tails, which will start to cry if Yoshi gets hurt, and the player loses a life if they are taken away.

name: You Alone Can Defeat Evil
summary: You Alone Can Defeat Evil is a gripping and challenging 2D top-down action-adventure game.

name: Your Story: Games with Death
summary: A medieval text quest in the "Choose Your Own Adventure" genre, where each choice could be your last. Create your story with more than 2,000 events, 200 of which will prove fatal. In a world where death plays against you, can you outsmart it and write your own story?

name: You've Changed
summary: You've Changed is an anomaly horror game in which you unravel a mystery behind the anomalies. Imagine "spot the difference" but scary. The game features 8-bit era inspired art and rotoscoped enemy animations.

name: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijoushugi no Kyoushitu he: Merge Puzzle Tokubetsu Shiken
summary:
Experience the story of the "Yomi" anime with the easy-to-use and addictive "Merge Puzzle"!
There are no difficult operations to advance the game! Combine various objects and clear the mission!
The side scenario also features a behind-the-scenes story that is not depicted in the anime!

name: Yoiyami Biscuit
summary: Gensokyo is overflowing with snacks! A roguelike twin-stick shooter starring Rumia where you fight using the power of snacks and items.

name: You're in the Movies
summary: You're in the Movies is a party game and features the process of filming a movie on one of the 30 scenarios that can involve up to four people. Actions include the application of make-up, jogging in place, driving a car and playing volleyball. Previous video can be stored on the console, as well as to send to friends via e-mail.

name: Your Shape Featuring Jenny McCarthy
summary: Your Shape is a revolutionary new fitness product that is laser-focused on you, ensuring you get the most personalized, effective and fun workout possible. The Your Shape camera comes with the game and, using proprietary fitness tracking technology, scans you, giving you a full body shape analysis. The game combines that analysis with the results of your fitness test and your goals to create a personalized fitness program to help you meet your goals as efficiently and effectively as possible. Unlike any other fitness product, when you begin your workout, the camera projects your image onto the TV. Because the camera tracks your movements, your coach can give you real-time input on how you're doing and advice on how to do it better. And, you get all of these benefits without having to hold a controller as you workout, leaving your hands free to focus on the exercises. In fact, the game encourages you to incorporate your own exercise equipment (weights, balance ball, etc). Just tell it what you have at home, and your coach will add it to your personal workout. No other fitness product provides this level of personalization and interactivity while leaving your hands free.

name: Yoyaku Tokuten: Pokémon Colosseum Kakuchou Disc
summary: The Bonus Disc contains two options: Poké Coupon Title, which allows Pikachu and other rewards to be obtained, and Relic Stone, which allows Celebi to be obtained. Unlike the US Bonus Disc, owning (a Japanese version of) Pokémon Colosseum is required at first to receive any gifts.

name: Yoshi's Archipelago
summary: Yoshi’s Archipelago is a community collab game made in SMBX. It was created under strict pretenses in an effort to make it one of the most solid Mario episodes imaginable. Whether we succeeded or not, well, that's up to you now, isn't it?

name: Yomawari: The Long Night Collection
summary: Traverse the haunting world of Yomawari: Night Alone as a young girl searches for her sister, or share in the terror facing schoolgirls Yui and Haru in Yomawari: Midnight Shadows. Uncover the mysteries plaguing a rural Japanese town, hide from the things lurking in the night, and maybe get home alive...

name: Yoram: Question Arc
summary: A mansion drenched in heavy rain. Heirs gathered, each eyeing the family fortune. And you—who committed a murder in their midst. As a chain of killings begins, YORAM follows Irene Lindbergh, a murderer hiding her crime, as she searches for the truth buried deep within the estate.

name: Your Time Has Come
summary: They traded everything for fame, money and power. You are the collector: build your deck, play cards, manipulate the environment and eliminate the humans. Make their time come.

name: Your Music Puzzle
summary: A puzzle game, where pieces are generated based on your mp3/wav music. Put the track back into shape using sound as your only clue. Pop, rock, rap, classics - this game works perfectly with all music genres.

name: Your Home
summary: This game originally participate on Global Game Jam 2019! This is a story of the man, which return home from the hard work, just to find out what his home, become a deadly trap. And to get out, you need to play some game with a bloody maniac.

name: Yonder World: Interview with the Void
summary: A psychological horror story, with a spiking sense of danger and gentle melancholy. An out of this world adventure, revolving around books, memories and mortality. Along the way, perhaps you shall pick up pieces of a long forgotten heart, or some unlikely companions that you never knew you needed.

name: Yondel
summary: Yondel is an endless survival RPG set in a limitless world you can shape and conquer. Craft, build, and brave the depths of underground dungeons in search of power and secrets.

name: You VS Drugs: Education & Prevention
summary: 'The Enemy' can enslave anyone, anywhere. By taking on the role of real-life Agents who exist in our brain and embarking on an adventure that will defy your imagination, you will be empowered to better protect yourself, and the people you love —if you have what it takes!

name: Yorunomori Bus Stop
summary: A short walk while waiting for the bus. An exploration game where you encounter strange events.

name: Yo-Kai Watch Gerapo Rhythm
summary: A mobile rhythm game, spin-off of the Yo-Kai Watch series.

name: Yokai Onsen
summary: Yokai Onsen is a cozy idle onsen management game that sits at the side of your screen. When the human world sleeps, weary yokai and spirits visit your bathhouse to cleanse their burdens.As the mysterious owner, you’ll welcome guests, renovate rooms, earn gold, and grow your steamy business.

name: Yoomurjak's Ring
summary: After his mother’s death, Jonathan Hunt, a young journalist from New York, decides to set off for Hungary for the first time in his life. While in the town of Eger, he discovers a peculiar legend involving an antique book and a doomed journey through time that stranded the writer's aide in the 16th century.

name: You Don't Know Jack: The In-Your-Face (Book) Trivia Game
summary: Your favorite irreverent trivia game! On Facebook! Who could have thought having friends would be good for something?

name: You Can't Scare Me
summary:
Create the ultimate scare-sperience in You Can’t Scare Me - a haunted house game where you can scare or be scared! Team up to scare your friends - or your friends can try to scare you!

Explore 8 creepy levels to find hidden treasures. Set scary traps to frighten your friends - and get points if they scream! Stay invisible and stage creepy encounters all around them - or appear in front of them as a terrifying monster to make them really flip their lid!

Can you freak out your friend enough to reduce them to a shadow of their former selves? Can your friend keep their cool long enough to find the hidden keys and escape the horrible nightmare you’ve crafted for them?

name: Youmu-Youmu Ball
summary:
It's time to do some dexterity and reflex training with everybody's favorite half-human, half-phantom gardener sword girl, Youmu Konpaku!

Help Youmu keep the Yin-Yang orbs in the air for as long as she can with as many slashes as possible.

Try not to drop too many! Or maybe drop a few, it may be helpful!

name: Youmu-Youmu Ball
summary:
It's time to do some dexterity and reflex training with everybody's favorite half-human, half-phantom gardener sword girl, Youmu Konpaku!

Help Youmu keep the Yin-Yang orbs in the air for as long as she can with as many slashes as possible.

Try not to drop too many! Or maybe drop a few, it may be helpful!

name: Your Crown Is Mine
summary: Take the throne and fix the corrupt kingdom— or worsen it! A villainess life sim and visual novel where you balance your stats and romance rival nations' leaders for foreign policy purposes. How will you rule the country?

name: Young Suns
summary:
Young Suns is a 1-4 player narrative life sim set on Jupiter in an optimistic alternative future, intended for one-to-two hours of daily play, alone or with friends.

Build your home among the stars, and take it with you on adventures!

name: Yorg.io
summary: Yorg.io is a game about supply chains and zombies. Your goal is to build a base which survives the night, when zombies attack. Build defensive towers to protect your base. Towers need resources, so you have to build a supply chain using mines and processors. Try to survive as long as possible - can you beat your friends?

name: Yoiyo Mori no Hime
summary: When her village was burned by the militarized country of Stahl, Ilza escaped into a dark forest and ends up lost. People believe that the forest, "Yoiyo Mori", is cursed, and those who take a step inside will never come out again. As she wanders inside the forest, Ilza loses consciousness and is taken into a certain mansion—where she finds seven men who bear resentment towards Stahl. They are waiting for a chance to take revenge on the country, and her life with them has just begun…

name: You Belong Here
summary: Family man Philip Oakes wakes up with a piercing headache, unable to remember his past. Dazed, he explores an old home, receiving guidance from a caller on the phone. As Philip walks through the familiar rooms, he uncovers a reality better left forgotten.

name: You Suck and I Hate You
summary: 180 levels of projectile dodging action through 6 locations. the story? who cares..,,.,. gorespin wants to destrouy the internet anf you gotta stop him!!! just dontgethit buddy. i told you n e way

name: You. Me. Heaven.
summary:
Tova used to be a real bully back in school, many years ago. One day a strange shadow knocks her door and brings back a slice of her dirty past.

Visit the fearsome Castle Death Spider(tm), meet lots of zany characters, play rock paper and scissors against an evil warlock, participate in the surreal family show ”Guests with chests”, find out what’s behind the secret door in Tovas basement (but there IS no basement… or is there?), go beyond space and time to a secret alternative dimension… and make choices that shapes the story and it’s resolution.

”You. Me. Heaven.” is an independent follow-up on the critically-acclaimed surreal point-and-click-adventure ”You. Me. Hell.”, but doesn’t require you to have played the first game first.

This is not a game about heroes. This is a game about a shy bullied girl, and about a former bully’s journey through anguish and remorse.

name: Yo-kai Watch: Medal Wars
summary: Yo-kai Watch: Medal Wars was an action role-playing game developed by Level-5 in collaboration with Netmarble Corp. It was originally released in Japan on July 30, 2019, before ending service on December 3, 2020.

name: Yolo Space Hacker 2: Mission Bahamas
summary: Alternate between infiltration and hacking of cameras and servers, using real tools. Sharpen your OSInt skills, prepare a trojan, and launch a targeted phishing attack to hack in total discretion...

name: Yo-Jin-Bo: The Bodyguards
summary: Yo-Jin-Bo: The Bodyguards is a Japanese visual novel produced by Two-Five.

name: You are an Ancient Chinese Poet in Exile
summary: lament your fate and write a poem about it

name: You Were Made for Loneliness
summary:
It's the future. The remnants of humanity, in the aftermath of a cataclysmic event known only as The Fall, have fled a dying homeworld to seek refuge among the colonies of the solar system. 
 
Twenty years later in a small pawnshop on Callisto, an android is waking up from a deep slumber. Within her, long faded memories shine to life once more.

name: Your Gay Monster Family
summary: Only one ending. Don't worry about it.

name: Yo, Matias: Sueños Peligrosos
summary: A side-scroller platform game of Sendra's strip cartoon, Yo, Matías centered in dreams and nightmares.

name: Your God Is False
summary: A surreal adventure game with elements of puzzles about a girl with delusional ideas of messianic greatness.

name: You Are Not Alice
summary: YOU ARE NOT ALICE is a social engineering sandbox game where you play the role of a hacker who has taken over Alice's work computer. Your goal is to spread through her company by talking to her coworkers and convincing them to run a virus file you can send them.

name: Your Turn To Die: Chapter 2, Part One
summary: Chapter 2, Part One is the third part of Your Turn to Die: Death Game By Majority. It was originally released on NicoNico on August 7, 2018.

name: Your Turn To Die: Final Chapter, Part One
summary: Final Chapter, Part One is the fifth part of Your Turn To Die: Death Game by Majority. This chapter is divided into further parts for the release due to technical difficulties. Part One - Section A was released on February 27, 2020, and Part One - Section B was released on May 30, 2021.

name: You're A Dick
summary:
Follow Dick on his short trip to find the love of his life, Vulva, who is missing.
Find all the easter eggs!

name: Young Wife Souffle
summary: A role-playing game from Odontotyranus.

name: Yoshi's Woolly World: Special Edition
summary: A bundle containing the Yoshi's Woolly World game and a Green Yarn Yoshi amiibo.

name: You Don't Know Jack Vol. 2
summary: You Don't Know Jack Vol. 2 is the mutant offspring of the original fast-paced trivia game where you are a contestant on a manic game show. With all the excitement of the first game, lots of mind-blowing surprises, plus four additional question types, volume 2 will scrape the trivia out of your cranium like the seedy pulp from a melon.

name: You
summary:
I NEED TO TALK TO GOD.

After the sun murdered the moon, and her corpse flooded all the earth, YOU wants to talk to god to ask him one single question. You can transform into a gold statue, this form will help you advance your drowned world and find yourself in it.

Find the god of the sun before he finds you.

YOU is an abstract psychological-horror with driven narrative with puzzles aspects to

YOU features flashing images, artistic nudity, light gore, explicit language, as well as themes of abuse and suicide. The play session is around 45–60 minutes.

name: Yoshimi-kun wa Game Bakkari
summary: A romance simulation game where you connect with a classmate you're interested in and build a relationship through online gaming. You can use your PC camera to video call Yoshimi-kun.

name: Yo-Kai Watch Blasters: White Dog Squad
summary:
Yo-Kai Watch is back and more action-packed than ever, as Yo-Kai Watch Blasters: Red Cat Corps and White Dog Squad are coming to Nintendo 3DS family systems!

Players can team up with up to three other friends either locally or online to fight towering Big Bosses, using skills and powerful Soultimate Moves. While previous YO-KAI WATCH games focused on turn-based battles, YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS drops you into real-time skirmishes, in the first ever action RPG for the series.

During these battles, you directly control your Yo-kai as you strategise with different skills and equipment to defeat huge bosses. By taking on various fast-paced missions, players will embark on a journey to meet, befriend and battle more than 400 new and returning Yo-kai.

Each of the two versions of the game – YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS: White Dog Squad or YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS: Red Cat Corps – contains different Yo-kai, missions and bosses. By trading between the two, you can collect all the Yo-kai!

By linking save data from YO-KAI WATCH 2: Bony Spirits, YO-KAI WATCH 2: Fleshy Souls or YO-KAI WATCH 2: Psychic Specters, you can get one of three special Yo-kai to take into battle."

name: Yo-Kai Watch 2: Psychic Specters
summary: Become inspirited and complete the ultimate Yo-Kai Watch experience. The strange but friendly troublemakers, Yo-kai, are back in a time-traveling adventure, and this time their mysterious world is packed with exclusive quests, wicked Yo-kai to befriend, fully new areas to explore, and a revamped Blasters action co-op mode featuring new bosses.

name: Yonesawara Hospital
summary:
Yonesawara Hospital is a single-player exploration horror game from the first-person perspective.
The game focuses on the search for the abandoned hospital "Yonesawara Hospital", and by finding various clues, the truth about what happened at the hospital will be revealed.

name: You Have to Burn the Rope
summary: A port of Kian Bashiri's flash game of the same name.

name: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
summary: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people. Play as a young elephant tasked to save a world he’s never seen before, and explore the rich history of a kingdom where humans, zombies and robots live side by side.

name: Your Shape Fitness Evolved 2012
summary: Your Shape Fitness Evolved 2012 is the sequel to Your Shape: Fitness Evolved, the #1 fitness franchise on Kinect for Xbox 360. Exercise your way with a fun and customizable experience that delivers serious results. Your Shape includes over 90 hours of activities, so you can design a workout tailored to your fitness level, goals, schedule and preferences. Focus your workouts on specific muscle groups. And choose from fitness activities like Boot Camp, Cardio Boxing, Jump Rope and Yoga, and new dance classes like Latin, Hip-hop, African and Bollywood. The state-of-the-art motion tracking provides feedback on your moves, and now tracks floor exercises like push-ups and sit-ups. With Your Shape Center, share and compete with your friends and the global community.

name: Your boss is calling...
summary: Try to work without falling asleep

name: Yoshi's Crafted World
summary: Lead Yoshi on a brand new adventure that will turn everything you've come to expect from side-scrolling games upside down! Explore a great, big world decorated like a miniature diorama in a new art style for the franchise, where each side-scrolling stage has the traditional front side as well as a flip side with different views and surprises. Look for items throughout the stage as Yoshi makes his way to the goal. You can even join up with a friend!

name: You Are a Failed Murderer
summary: A visual novel passed through an image compressor Play as a murder unsure of his entire life, down to his name. But you have a mission. One you NEED to undertake.

name: Yo-kai Watch 4
summary: A grand journey that goes beyond the time and space of the world in which Natsume, Nate, and Shin live in.

name: Yosumin!
summary:
Make rectangles of the same type of yosumin to make them disappear in this mind-bending puzzle game. The more you get, the better you'll feel!

Yosumin!, Square Enix's puzzle masterpiece, is here! Simply select rectangles of the same type of yosumin to make them disappear in this simple yet challenging puzzle game.

name: You Understand Kawaii
summary: Communicate with strangers' dogs.

name: Youmu's Cube Adventure
summary: Youmu Konpaku has been turned into a cube! Help her escape by navigating her through 100 levels in this challenging physics-precision game inspired by the Ball Revamped flash game series! Also includes a lower-difficulty option for a less strict experience.

name: Your Painting, Sir
summary: Recreate paintings using newspaper cutouts — Analyze the painting, search the newspaper for similar elements, carefully cut them out, and place them on their correct position. Will you fool your boss with your arts and crafts?

name: You Shouldn't Be Here
summary: This short psychedelic visual novel takes place in a strange world inhabited by harrowing creatures shunned by the light. You’ll meet someone who has made this world their own, and in doing so, learn the reason why you shouldn't be there.

name: Yoyo Punk
summary: Swing, Fight & Crush your opponents in intense PvP combat arenas in this unique, fast-paced rope-physics fighter.

name: Your Average Bear
summary: Take the role of the sneakiest bear this side of Your Average Camp — Accept food delivery orders from your fellow animals, collect the food with the help of various tools, and hand them off without getting caught!

name: You Found a Hole in the Ground
summary:
