You bought an ancient map from an old man in a tavern. He said it would show you the location of a colossal dungeon, at the bottom of which would lay what your heart most desired.
With your last money you buy some supplies and head onward towards adventure.

A small incremental game about finding your own fortune and maybe that of others too.

name: Yo-kai Watch 4++
summary: Yo-kai Watch 4++ is an updated version of Yo-kai Watch 4 with new content for the game, there will be new areas like "Blossom Heights" and “Cauldron-Boiled Hell”, a new Yo-kai to befriend, a new boss and a new multiplayer mode.

name: You Are Weak
summary:
A ritual for the darkest of times.

A game about community and change in a fractured world.

name: You Picked the Wrong Castle
summary: A cursed Goblin by the name of Apollo (you) has snuck into the castle to carry out a personal vendetta against the King of Topaz. In the process, Apollo is cursed and his power is rewinding. Outnumbered, out armed and slowly regressing, it looks like you picked the wrong castle.

name: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark - Deluxe Edition
summary: A young girl awakens in a dark, unfamiliar forest with no recollection of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, she crosses paths with a mysterious individual who reveals to her that she’s been cursed. In order to break the curse, she needs to explore the streets of her town at night to seek out her lost memories. However, malevolent ghosts lurk within the shadows, and the girl must avoid them by running, hiding, and shutting her eyes if she hopes to survive long enough to break her curse.

name: Your Blade, My Heart
summary:
Despite being a member of royal family Solstice, you were never destined for greatness. Instead, that honor was given to the next in line for the throne: your brother, Atlas. Feelings of jealously, inferiority, and anxiety grew as years past, until they became too much to bear. Not wanting to be lost to history and feel you've earned your place in your family, you aim to become a soldier in your kingdom's army.

However, with no prior combat experience, your Father assigns the kingdom's best knight to train you: Grand Knight Ramon Dayore. He's a stoic man who's scratched and clawed his way to the top. However, his experiences in the war have made him close off his heart. Will you be able to open the door to his heart, and help him love again?

name: Yooperlite
summary: Uncover the secrets of a corrupted land in a unique platforming journey with Yooperlite. Facing exploration and adventure challenges, while you walk, jump, slide and collect the fireflies to purify this world. Save what's been lost and break free from the darkness. Do you have what it takes to restore the light?

name: Yo-Kai Watch 1 for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Yo-kai Watch centers on a boy who gets a special watch that lets him befriend and help mischievous Yo-kai and later summon them to fight other Yo-kai. Players can overcome challenges and help various characters solve everyday problems with the help of Yo-kai friends. These eccentric Yo-kai resemble anything from inanimate objects to mythical creatures.
Yo-Kai Watch 1 for Nintendo Switch is a version for Nintendo Switch of the original game realised in Nintendo 3Ds

name: Yooca: Next Horizon
summary: A multiplayer life-sim RPG where you build character traits like Net Worth, Influence, Authority, and Strength, master real-world skills, craft items, complete quests, and shape your story in a vibrant, evolving metaverse filled with challenges, friends, and opportunities.

name: You Must Survive
summary: A thriller pixelated horror game where the only way to survive is to escape an unknown entity, which is hunting you around every corner in your own house. Now the only place where you should be safe is the place where you must leave. And remember one thing: YOU. MUST. SURVIVE.

name: You Must Retry
summary: You Must Retry is a roguelike where you will kill crowds of enemies. Dynamic battles, unique items and abilities. Character upgrading for any style of play. And even death here is not in vain, because after each attempt you will become only stronger.

name: Your Glass Heart in My Hands
summary:
You are fast asleep.

You are drifting through the darkness: a seemingly endless abyss from which there is no escape.

There is nothing but the darkness: leagues and fathoms and feet of it...

But you were a person once, you know, before you found yourself in this sorry state. You had a name — perhaps you had several names — and thoughts of your own; feelings, too.

You had friends. A family, perhaps.

You had a life.

You might have had many lives.

You are one, yet you are many. Fragmented, your past dances behind your eyelids like shards of glass: sharp to the touch, and yet...

Will you reach out to touch these broken bits and pieces of your past?

Do you dare?

name: Young Conker
summary:
Young Conker comes off the screen and into your world for an exciting holographic platforming adventure.

Enemies and challenges adapt to your furniture, floors, walls, and ceilings, so even stages you've completed feel fresh again in new or rearranged rooms.

name: Yore VR
summary: Yore VR is an open world sandbox game built from the ground up in VR. Starting in the forest, it's up to you to decide where your journey will take you. Perhaps you'll stumble upon forgotten ruins, practice archery skills at the range or hew a tree. At the end of the day, you might just want to lay down next to a lazy stream. Either way, the choice is yours.

name: Yokai Hunter Shintaro
summary: Yokai Hunter Shintaro presents the adventures of two heroes on a quest to restore balance between the human world and the Yokai kingdom. It will be your mission to kill the different bosses of each stage to restore order.

name: Young Detective
summary: Wherever there are people, there are rivers and lakes. The rivers and lakes are treacherous and unpredictable.

name: You're Fired!
summary: Welcome to the most realistic depiction of the most unrealistic depiction of corporate America ever!

name: Yoshiwara Higanbana: Kuon no Chigiri
summary: A port for Switch and Vita.

name: You Make the Game
summary: Discover treasure, solve puzzles and create your own epic Lego adventure!

name: You Are The Code
summary: A programming puzzle game where bugs are eating away your code! One problem: YOU CAN'T TYPE. Navigate and run pre-existing lines of code to make your output match the goal!

name: You are an ancient poet at the neo-orchid pavilion
summary:
When the emperor himself summons you to write a poem about the state of things, who are you to refuse? Torn between two factions, led by the emperor's half-sister and his most loyal general, you have the unenviable job of unpicking the complex threads of political conspiracies and absurdist ideologies.

Write a poem, compete to become the official court poet, possibly uncover a plot to usurp the throne, and try not to offend anyone... unless?

An entry for IFComp 2025, and a sequel of sorts to you are an ancient chinese poet in exile.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage
summary: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage is a deck-building roguelite set in the world of Yohane the Parhelion.

name: You Complete Me
summary: Dexterity, tenacity and brainpower. You'll need all of these and more to succeed in this completionist quest to awaken an ancient island. The world is becoming overpopulated. As you venture across oceans in search of new land you pick up a strange radio signal. Is it a voice? Is it asking for help?

name: Yoshimitsu Hatsumi
summary: Yoshimitsu Hatsumi is an addictive mix of RPG and classic side-scrolling combat.

name: You Are Jeff Bezos
summary: A simple text-based adventure exploring the age-old question: What would you do if you had more money than any single human being should ever have?

name: Youniverse
summary: Customize your avatar, decorate your apartment, and explore a vibrant city in Youniverse, a social metaverse and life simulation. Race friends in Sprint Fury, master coffee-making in Barista Challenge, and test your trivia knowledge in Trivia Thrill. Create, connect, and compete!

name: Youda Marina
summary: Youda Marina brings together all the fun of landscape design with exciting time management action! Build the marina of your dreams and get some sun and fun each time you play. Be creative with your exotic harbor and have fun managing its everyday problems. As the harbor master you will be responsible for keeping all your Marina visitors happy and spending money. Create the most beautiful marina in the world!

name: Yoga Lesson VR
summary: Become a Yoga Master of an adorable girl. Become her Yoga Master to instruct yoga poses from various angles and give the right advice. You can be hard on her at times, or cheer her up with presents. Instruct her so that she can get good grades in yoga competitions and pretty yoga clothes. She will thank you in her own way.

name: Yokai Art: Night Parade of One Hundred Demons
summary: By accident, you broke the seal of the mysterious book in your household's storage. The mythical book contains an enormous magical power that allows users to control any Yokai by defeating them and recording down their name.

name: You Died but a Necromancer Revived You
summary: You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! Reaching the top is no easy feat: The pathways are narrow, full of traps and on top of that, the floor will start exploding behind you if you take too long!

name: You Are 100k Light Years Away
summary: An indie game which is inspired from "The Starry Night”. Players make the beam in the sky fly from stars to stars. The game is simple in control and has very pleasant grahpic and sweet music.

name: Yoshima: Hentai Simulator - Horny Summer DLC
summary:
What are your plans for the summer? I understand that, as always, there's a ton to do, but in any case, you need to find a free day! You buy a ticket and invite your neighbor (and maybe something more) to head to the beach!

There can be no "buts" or "we'll see." Grab the essentials and hit the road! The sound of the waves, the rustle of the sand, and the oasis of shade under a palm tree will be the backdrop to your one-day, yet endlessly long love story.

name: Yokai Goddess
summary: Yokai Goddess is a mix of bullet hell and adventure, inspired by classic arcade shoot 'em ups and RPG Maker horror games. You'll have to break through relentless enemy attacks while uncovering the secrets of the Seven School Mysteries.

name: You’re Here Again
summary: You’re Here Again is a weirdcore fast-paced movement shooter, exploring the liminal space between the end of life and whatever comes after. Experience the slow deconstruction of your existence as you utilise a wide range of weapons to kill the strange creatures inhabiting this strange new realm.

name: Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair
summary:
Yooka and Laylee are back for a brand new adventure! Get ready for the ultimate challenge - the Impossible Lair!

Capital B has created a Hivemind device and used it to enslave the toughest bees in the Royal Stingdom - the Royal Beettalion Guard!

Liberate them from chapters filled with only the tastiest 2D platforming trimmings, and take on a 3D overworld that contains a wealth of puzzles, secrets and some familiar faces!

name: You Know The Drill
summary: You Know The Drill is a relaxing incremental mining game about digging underground to harvest ores. Collect resources, sell them, and upgrade your drill to go even deeper!

name: Yo-kai Sangokushi
summary:
Yo-kai Sangokushi is a turn-based tactical role-playing game developed by Koei Tecmo and published by Level-5.
It's a crossover between the Yo-kai Watch and Romance of the Three Kingdoms series.

name: Yollen
summary: Before Megaloot, there was Yollen - a brutally minimalist game by solo dev axilirate. Your peaceful life is gone. Now it’s all about the grind. Climb every skill tree, master every craft, and turn the grind into pure payback.

name: You Are Liam: Shadow Memories
summary: You have done some things you're not proud of. Now you must enter your own mind to come to terms with the things you've done. Loop around rooms, solve puzzles and hide from different monsters as you uncover your own truth.

name: Yorg.io 3
summary: Defend, Attack, Survive! Build up your base and defeat the zombies with this unique combination of tower defense, base building and supply chain management. Now with multiplayer, mods and loads of new content!

name: Young Souls
summary: Young Souls combines the beat'em up and RPG genres in a world created with stunning art direction. Explore the world of humans and that of the goblins, both teeming with enemies but also full of unexpected and friendly encounters waiting to be discovered.

name: Youda Safari
summary: Give tourists a once in a lifetime holiday experience as you guide them past rebellious rhinos, hilarious hippos and much other wildlife in your own safari park! Groups of enthusiastic and eager safari tourists depend on you to show them the most exotic animals in their natural habitat when they book a safari. Experience the beauty of wildlife when you go on one adventure after the other.

name: Your Very Last Words
summary: Live the last ten minutes in the life of Juan Fuentes, who has been given the chance to choose his very last words before death. Captured by Victoriano Huerta's army after the Ten Tragic Days, Juan will have a brief while to think about his life, death, family, relationships, fights and existence.

name: You Are Empty
summary: You Are Empty is a first-person shooter video game based in a fictionalized postwar Soviet Union. The game begins with the protagonist waking up in a ruined hospital, and it soon becomes clear that the populace has been afflicted by mutation and madness. He then must battle to stay alive and unravel the mystery.

name: Your Boyfriend
summary: Your Boyfriend is a game where you deal with a man's unhealthy desire to have you, no matter who gets hurt. And he's not afraid to leave the body laying around for you to find either.

name: You Do Not Exist
summary: In the near future, galactic colonization has grown wild and untamable. Take on bounties, confront rivals, and find yourself in the middle of a terrible conspiracy as Birdy, a bounty hunter fighting for their future.

name: Yosei Wars
summary: Defeat the Junk Food and Rescue the Tooth Fairies! Platforming game inspired by many arcade classics. 9 out of 10 dentists recommend wishlisting this game!

name: You Have No Time
summary: You Have No Time is a fast-paced 3D puzzle game that puts players in control of time itself. In this game, players have the power to slow down time, giving them a chance to outsmart enemies, avoid traps, and save their allies. Players only have 30 seconds to solve each puzzle before time runs out.

name: Young Hearts
summary: ‘Young Hearts' is a visual novel in the genres of romance and slice of life, telling stories about the everyday life of a student company living in a warm southern town: stories about their secrets, dreams, love, their problems and ghosts of the past…

name: You are the Judge!
summary: As a judge of the Kobardde court, solve complex cases inspired by actual events. Your decisions will directly affect people's (and perhaps yours) lives. You may have to make difficult decisions for your family, country, and life. What kind of judge will you be?

name: Your Big, Cute Monster Farm
summary: Create a farm at the bottom of the screen and enjoy planting and harvesting with your monster companions! They handle all the work—just plan the layout, decorate, and wait for fun crop mutations. Take a break from busy life and enjoy the calm joy of farming.

name: Yoga Sex Practice
summary: YOGA SEX PRACTICE is a visual novel where you will do yoga with beautiful girls and get a lot of sex.

name: Your Computer Might Be at Risk
summary: Your Computer Might Be At Risk is a first-person narrative puzzle game. Locked up in a room after a mysterious car accident, you must figure out how to escape while surviving dangerous trials.

name: You Suck at Football
summary: A physics-based rage game where you and your friends control a chaotic football through parkour and deadly drops. One wrong bounce and you lose it all. Climb together or fall together — can you reach the top?

name: Yoshi
summary: Yoshi is a puzzle game featuring the titular character. In this game, the player must stack two of the same Mario enemy on top of one another to clear them. The concept of the game was inspired by Tetris.

name: Yooka-Replaylee
summary: Embark on an epic open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure with Yooka and Laylee! The search for Pagies starts anew in Yooka-Replaylee, the enhanced definitive version of the beloved indie darling with all new challenges, secrets, mechanics, and accessibility options.

name: Yokai Hunters
summary: You are yokai hunters venturing into cursed lands from which no one returns. Assemble your team, choose your class, and attempt to banish ancient evil in dark feudal Japan. Survive — or become part of the legend.

name: Youda Jewel Shop
summary: Design the most astonishing bracelets, rings and earrings, serve your customers quickly and turn your very own Jewel Shop into a glittering success! Once you mastered the basic techniques of jewelry design, you go on the journey of a lifetime encountering ‘The Russian’ , the mystical Zen Lady and thieves that try to rob your shop!

name: Your Only Move is Hustle
summary: Your Only Move Is Hustle is an online, turn-based fighting game and superpowered fight scene simulator. Using a unique and accessible control scheme, harness the power of precognition to land the perfect blow. Master your technique, execute flashy combos, and outsmart opponents across the world, frame-by-frame.

name: Yoshi vs. Windows
summary:
Yoshi vs. Windows is a Yoshi fangame created by Supertoad2k. In it you play as Yoshi trapped in a computer, who needs to stop Bill Gates from taking over the world. It is one of the older MFGG fangames and possibly one of the first truly original ones to be submitted to MFGG, and like almost all other fangames at that time, is a platformer.

Yoshi vs. Windows was infamous at the time of release for being an unprotected fangame. This lead to many of its contents being used by other people for other works when the game making tool of choice was The Games Factory. Eventually a "Platinum" version was released by Supertoad2k and Nite Shadow with updated graphics, a save system and of course, was protected so others could not steal things from it. The original is now officially declared open-source, although the game making community today uses more advanced software than TGF, thus rendering it pretty much obsolete.

name: Young Justice: Legacy
summary: Young Justice: Legacy is a multiplayer action RPG based on the Young Justice TV series.

name: Yokai Art 2: Tales of the Nine-Tails
summary: After defeating Fujin and Raijin, Hiro and his allies found peace at his grandfather’s house. One day, Sanbi sensed a distant summon. After tracing the energy, they discovered it came from her true form—the nine-tailed fox. Determined to help, Hiro and his friends set off on a new journey.

name: Yoshi's Cookie
summary: Yoshi's Cookie is a puzzle game similar to Tetris, in which the player is given a playing field populated with cookies of five various types arranged in a rectangular grid. The player moves randomly placed cookies into rows and columns of cookies with similar patterns. When a row or column of the same cookies is successfully assembled, the line will disappear, and the player can begin to work on a new row or column. The main objective of each level is to clear the playing field of all the cookies.

name: Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi Bangi: Sugoroku Eiyuuki
summary:
Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi Bangi: Sugoroku Eiyuuki is a sugoroku board game spin-off of the Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi strategy series. It plays similarly to the Dokapon series: the player, as one of the major warlords of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms (called Sangokushi in Japan), must move around a board taking territory and fighting in one-on-one battles with NPC bandits and soldiers. Other squares on the board lead to various events that change the player's status or help/hinder them in other ways.

Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi Bangi is based on manga artist Mitsuteru Yokoyama's acclaimed historical manga that retells the Romance of the Three Kingdoms story. However, characters are drawn in a more comedic super deformed style to highlight that the game is a less serious offshoot.

name: Yoru ga Kuru!: Square of the Moon - Remastered
summary: Ryou lives a dull life in Otsuna until a red-eyed girl named Izumi invites him to join her fight against the Light Hunters. When the True Moon rises, the Light Hunters descend upon the city, leaving chaos in their wake. Cloaked in the shadows of the night, this story of supernatural suspense begins.

name: Yo-Kai Watch 2: Bony Spirits
summary: Much like its predecessor, Yo-kai Watch 2 is an open world role-playing video game, where the player is given control of player character Nathan Adams, or alternatively, Katie Forester. Players navigate around the open world using the Nintendo 3DS' touchscreen to find and befriend various Yo-kai, which are scattered across the overworld. Players befriend Yo-kai by giving them a food that they like before beginning battle, and after defeating the Yo-kai it approaches the player character and gives them its Yo-kai Medal, allowing it to be summoned at will. A new feature in battles is using the touch screen to find a particular sweetspot on an enemy Yo-kai to increase the likelihood of befriending it at the end of the battle, or other sweetspots for extra damage, extra money, or extra experience. Yo-kai can also be acquired through an in game Crank-a-kai (Gasha Machine) by collecting in-game coins or using Play Coins. Certain Yo-kai are necessary for completing the game's main quest, and special rare Yo-kai are acquired through various subquests. Yo-kai have the capability to evolve into more powerful versions of themselves if they reach a certain level, or they can evolve by combining with particular items or other Yo-kai. The Yo-kai are divided amongst eight different classes, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. There are also Legendary Yo-kai that can only be obtained by collecting a particular set of Yo-kai listed in the Yo-kai Medallium, a compendium of the different Yo-kai the player has encountered or befriended. When the player encounters a Yo-kai, he enters into battle with it using six Yo-kai that the player has befriended previously. The touchscreen is used during battles to rotate amongst the player's Yo-kai in battle at will. It is also used either to clear up status effects on the player's Yo-kai or to charge up the Yo-kai's Soultimate abilities. While the original Yo-kai Watch featured nearly 250 Yo-kai, Yo-Kai Watch 2 features nearly 450, including several that were featured as bosses in the original game.

name: You Arrive In A Town
summary: Assemble a party and journey through a tabletop game inspired world in our 1-4 player RPG Lite game You Arrive In A Town! Gather resources, complete quests, and slay monsters to progress through each of the time based stages!

name: Yoshi Goes to Tesco
summary: Browse the aisles for the items on your grocery list, get into some trouble, and solve minor puzzles in this short (15-25 minute) shitpost about the wonders and terrors of retail, with dumb references to outdated memes, copyright infringement and jokes about British "culture."

name: You See a Monster Smoking in the Parking Lot
summary: A horror-dramedy text adventure that ends in just one or two actions, but has 33 unique endings to discover. Some conclusions are dreadful and uncomfortable. Others somber. A few are just plain absurd. You set the tone. Investigate the smoking monster or kill it, think about your life, buy food, laugh or cry, drive away - and many options in between.

name: Your Royal Gayness
summary:
The library is on fire, cats have overrun the city and a wolf is munching on grandmothers in the forest. On top of that, princesses are knocking on your door, hungry for marriage!

Survive royal life as a gay prince in this ultimate fairytale parody game!

name: Your Turn To Die: Final Chapter, Part Two
summary: Final Chapter, Part Two is the sixth and final part of Your Turn To Die: Death Game by Majority. It will be released on Steam first, then the free version later. The chapter was scheduled to be released on Steam by February 21, 2024, but the date was postponed due to the amount of work. As for now, the chapter's release date is currently unknown.

name: You Have A Delivery
summary: You Have A Delivery is a stylized, fast-paced FPS action game, inspired by action-comedy films. Take down the mafia in one night: rip apart your enemies, unlock guns and perks, and deliver unstoppable chaos. You're the only one who can pull it off. Can you deliver it?

name: Yomawari: Night Alone
summary: Yomawari is a Japanese horror action game and features a female protagonist that is searching for her older sister and pet dog, while exploring a creepy town at night. She only has a flashlight at her disposal, and using said flash light will let her “see things that shouldn’t be seen.”

name: Your Train
summary: This is a simulation game of driving a train to transport customers on a Japanese railroad line.

name: You Are Grounded
summary: You Are Grounded" is a short psychological horror-slasher game from a first-person perspective. A terrifying killer clown terrorizes a teenager and his family on Halloween Eve.

name: You Must Sleep
summary:
You are John.
You have insomnia.
Monsters are attacking you.
But above all,
YOU
MUST
SLEEP

name: You Don't Know Jack Vol. 1 XL
summary: The original PC sensation that started it all! We've brought it back in all its virginal glory! The world was a much simpler place in 1995. The kids were listening to the grunge, the first test-tube gorilla was born at the Cincinnati Zoo, and a little trivia game called You Don't Know Jack took the interactive CD-ROM trivia game show world by storm. Play now and relive that crazy, mixed-up time all over again!

name: Yosemite Forest Ranger
summary: In Yosemite Forest Ranger you will fill the shoes of Theodore Thompson. You will find out why he left the big city life to be a Forest Ranger through Story Rich Gameplay and Voice Acting. With a Survival aspect as well. A very Rich Open World with loads of Forageables and Wildlife to Explore.

name: Your Average Platformer
summary: You're an unnamed character who wants to leave this world, end everything and find God. An adventurer tells him that the climb is perilous, but you still persist to find God. Gabriel is the last angel to have survived and become a mad angel. You are exploring this world to see what they are up to.

name: You Cannot Go Back!
summary: A game for Playdate. Test your memory, reach the treasure. Keep moving forwards, for you cannot go back!

name: Your Wife Oh
summary: Your wife. His wife. Whose wife? Everybody's wife! Want to raise a wife of your own? Just play with it! Wanna dance? The pas de deux kind. Just play it!Anyone who doesn't have a wife should report~

name: Your House
summary: A narrative puzzle-thriller that blurs the lines between games and books, reality and fiction, puzzles and storytelling.

name: YouFight
summary:
Discover integrated reality with this game mixing 2D fighting and video!

Keep your real appearance and become an outstanding boxer in the game thanks to an automated video cutting technique which allows to show some animations from your video capture.

For the first time of the Video Game History, be in a fighting video game and compete against real fighters!

name: Yoiyami Dancers
summary: Dodge bullets to the rhythm and take down everything that moves! A rhythmical danmaku action game based on Touhou Project series.

name: Yokoyama Mitsuteru: Sangokushi
summary:
Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi is a strategy game based on the anime and manga of the same name by manga artist Yokoyama Mitsuteru. The name simply means "Yokoyama Mitsuteru's version of Sangokushi", Sangokushi being the Japanese name for the Chinese literary classic Romance of the Three Kingdoms. The manga and anime retell the story of the book, with the game focused on this retelling.

During the game's development the anime adaptation was in full swing, so the game was intended to be a companion piece. This was a standard practice of Bandai at the time (Angel was a game publisher subsidiary of the toy giant), as was hiring freelance developers like TOSE to develop for them.

The game is a standard turn-based strategy war sim in the vein of Koei's much more prolific Romance of the Three Kingdoms series. The player and the AI-controlled rival kingdoms select actions that include diplomacy, combat and domestic matters such as farming and trade, with the ultimate goal being to wrest control over the rest of China from the other two kingdoms.

The game was followed up with two sequels: a standard sequel in Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi II and the board game spin-off Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi Bangi.

name: Yoshi's Woolly World
summary:
Set off with a friend through a wild, woolly world in this grand Yoshi adventure! A treasure trove of clever handicraft stages are ready for you to explore. Unravel their secrets and color your world with a spectrum of yarn balls to knit new paths and get every last collectible.

Knitting yarn, patchwork, and other handicraft materials combine into a whimsical and crafty backdrop for our knit Yoshi to explore. Instead of eggs, this time Yoshi tosses yarn balls that he can use to clear blocked paths, tangle-up enemies, or even knit together platforms and warp pipes. Yoshi can also tug at stray yarn to unravel walls and reveal hard-to-reach areas filled with hidden collectibles. Tackle challenges in local 2-Player co-op by partnering up with a friend. Gobble 'em up and spit 'em out to reach new heights or take out craftwork creepers like paratroopas, piranha plants and shy guys! It's time to get crafty.

name: Yodel-Oh!
summary: Take on Ram-Bam, Lamb-Bam and the whole bleatin' clan in the exciting Alpine climbing adventure that pits your wits against the meanest sheep in the mountain. Loaded with half-crazed herds, twisting targets and awesome fairway sounds, Yodel-Oh is guaranteed to have you yodeling for more.

name: You Can Only Turn Left
summary: You Can Only Turn Left is a playful exploration of the hypnagogic state between sleeping and wakefulness. Within this liminal space, memories morph into dreams and dreams feather into reality. You, the player have to navigate these hallucinations by choosing how the character creates their sleeping patterns. Inspired by game books and guided sleep meditations, this story invites you to imagine both the mundane and the fantastic to practice the mental flexibility of an avid dreamer.

name: Your Love Ai
summary: Your Love Ai is a game where you develop a relationship with an android robot named Ai, and your dialogue choices influence the ending. Will you be able to touch Ai's heart?

name: Yogurt Commercial 3
summary: Yogurt Commercial 3 is a sandbox puzzle adventure game where the player controls a fresh new yogurt commercial actor. You must travel the world amassing power in order to create the ultimate yogurt commercial of all time in this sandbox puzzle adventure game.

name: You And I
summary: "You And I” is an interactive film where you guide Mark, lost deep in the woods with his friend, Ace. However the more time the two spend together, the stranger the two become.

name: Yo-kai Watch
summary: Yo-kai Watch centers on a boy who gets a special watch that lets him befriend and help mischievous Yo-kai and later summon them to fight other Yo-kai. Players can overcome challenges and help various characters solve everyday problems with the help of Yo-kai friends. These eccentric Yo-kai resemble anything from inanimate objects to mythical creatures.

name: Your Mother
summary: "Your Mother" is a computer desktop companion. Experience the love and kindness from mothers.

name: Youda Farmer 3: Seasons
summary: Fight the seasonal weather conditions as you harvest and process farm products to rebuild and resupply the entire village after a horribly destructive winter storm. Build new farms and shops to handle all the takeaway orders and buy tools in the pawnshop to improve your workflow. Save up to build your very own hotel and serve hungry guests your finest dishes. Eventually show off your farming abilities in different challenges during the annual country fair.

name: Yog-Sothoth's Yard
summary: Manage a hotel and hire employees including Death, a dragon, a Demon-Slayer, and a bioroid maid. Build your wealth through various means and refine your strategies based on the predictions of Oracles. Your choices will determine which employees become enamored with you.

name: Yomi 2
summary: A fighting game in card form. Learn your character, practice combos, and read the opponent's tendencies. Strategic, turn-based card battling that lets you experience the nuances of fighting games like Street Fighter and Fantasy Strike by a lead designer who worked on both.

name: Your Sisters
summary: Who needs one desktop girl when you can have a whole squad? Meet your adorable chaos crew, always cute, sometimes weird and fun. Your Sisters is a little dose of dopamine for your boring desktop.

name: You Left Us
summary: Crowned the victor of Pirate Software Game Jam 14, You Left Us promises a heart-pounding journey through the depths of psychological horror. Stranded in the desolate snowfields of Greenland, your survival hinges on the fragile lifeline of your listening post.

name: Yomawari: Midnight Shadows
summary: The dark is no place to be alone. After a beautiful show of summer fireworks, two young girls begin to make their way home. However, a mysterious attacker separates them, and both must brave the haunting night filled with unspeakable terrors and survive the darkness.

name: Youyou Kengeki Musou
summary: Youyou Kengeki Musou is a 3D platformer Touhou fangame starring Youmu Konpaku.

name: Your Amazing T-Gotchi!
summary:
Has caring about a cute green anime girl always been the dream of your life? 
 
Well congratulations! You now have the ability to purchase a brand new T-Gotchi! 
 
Pay attention to her needs and she will be your most loyal friend!

name: Yoku's Island Express
summary: Yoku’s Island Express is an open world/metroidvania-style pinball adventure, Seamlessly blending platform navigation with pinball mechanics across a large open world. Yoku the dung beetle sets foot on the beach of Mokumana Island, ready to take on the duties as the new postman. But the ancient island God is trapped in a restless sleep and the islanders are plagued by quakes and storms brought forth by its nightmares. Yoku's Island Express is a unique and quirky adventure with handcrafted visuals, where you'll soar through the air, vacuum explosive snails, fight a Screetch, feed starving lemurs, discover the mystery of the Fruit Altar, wake an old god, and hopefully help tiny Yoku rebuild the island post-office.

name: You, Calligrapher
summary: "You, Calligrapher" is a VR Calligraphy simulator. In You, Calligrapher, you will be empowered to imitate the masterpieces of Chinese poets and scholars, draw and paint with traditional Chinese ink pen. Witness and experience the culture of Calligraphy!

name: Your Toy
summary:
Your Toy is a 3D first person escape game that incorporates elements of horror. Features an advanced no-repeat puzzle system, challenging puzzle content, as well as a well-designed backstory. Not only will you enjoy solving the game's puzzles, you will also experience the story through collecting various in-game items.
Are you ready to enter the nightmare?

name: Yoshi's Island: Super Mario Advance 3
summary:
Super Mario Advance 3 is a GBA remake for the SNES with the dinosaur Yoshi and his friends as main characters carrying Baby Mario and Luigi on their back.

Super Mario Advance is a four-part series for the GBA with Super Mario games of the NES and SNES era. The remakes came with adjusted graphics, sound and additional content. Each game of the series includes additionally the arcade-classic "Mario Bros" which can be played in multiplayer via link cable.

name: You Left Me
summary: A dark/funny/surreal game about loneliness and loss. Comes with chat-speaking cyclopic cat and moon that tells dad jokes.

name: Yoshi's Story
summary: Baby Bowser has taken the Super Happy Tree and cast a spell on Yoshi's world, turning it into the pages of a picture book. The only Yoshis not affected by the spell were six hatchlings that were still protected by their shells. It's up to them to reclaim the Super Happy Tree and restore happiness to the world. That is the only thing that can break Baby Bowser's Spell!

name: You're Invading My Space
summary: "You're Invading My Space" is a fast paced, space themed, wave survival game where every run is unique. Fight off endless procedurally generated enemy swarms, upgrade and unlock your ships and weapons, and push your limits as this angry galaxy throws everything it has at you.

name: Yoba2D
summary: A 2D shooter with unusual movement mechanics, because our character has a simple circle with a face. You have to explore complex abstract worlds and fight with other players and abstract personalities using quite familiar weapons.

name: You Must Build A Boat
summary: You Must Build A Boat is the sequel to the award winning "10000000". Travel the world, run procedurally generated dungeons finding artifacts, capturing monsters and recruiting crew for your...

name: Youropa
summary: When Youropa is torn apart, You must use your unique wall walking ability to navigate a strange fragmented city, restore it to former glory and learn who you really are. A platform puzzle paint adventure about breaking rules, being upside down and thinking outside the box.

name: You Gotta Get Off the Train
summary: Made at the Berlin Mini Jam. Your objective is to move each limb to crawl around to the exit of the train.

name: Yousician
summary: A music education game similar to Rocksmith, but with more focus on progress.

name: You adorable! Elfin Clay 2
summary: "The game that a grown man can play like a three year old." Even if you get angry or cry, someone will surely comfort.

name: Yo to the Yo!
summary: Throw novelty yoyos to the moon and beyond.

name: Yokai's Wish
summary: Destroy all the plans to seize the world by these beautiful demons, because if you do not cope with them, they will terrorize our planet for thousands of years, gather all your will into a fist and give them a decisive resistance!

name: Yokojiku de Manabu Sekai no Rekishi: Yoko-Gaku DS
summary: Yokojiku de Manabu Sekai no Rekishi: Yoko-Gaku DS is a game, developed by Bullets and published by Takara Tomy, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Your Mom
summary: Join a mysterious internet cult in a visual novel that plays out like a real conversation happening within a chat app.

name: Young Wife Yuka's Good Day to Cheat
You Are Lost
summary: You Are Lost is a dark game about the forest.

name: Yo-kai Watch Land
summary: Imagine Yo-kai in the palm of your hand! Take selfies, play mini-games, and scan your Yo-kai Medals to bring Yo-kai to life on your mobile device!

name: You Contain Multitudes
summary: a vampire jam game about memory, identity, and art

name: Young Archaeologist
summary: Our main character is a young archaeologist, our main task is to get to all the fossils

name: YoBro
summary: Ratz attack! Ratz attack! The city of Los Angeles is being invaded! Only Lil Bro', Camp California's rad skateboarding dude, can save it. The evil Ratz gang is unleashing a barrage of killer creatures and devices. Find incredibly cool weapons to fight back. Wipe out their earthquake machines and nasty man-eating plants with rocket grenades. Fight off wicked space aliens and launch your bonus attacks. It'll take everything you've got to send the Ratz packing.

name: You Are the Umpire
summary: Cricket trivia app for iOS and PS Mobile based on the British comic strip.

name: Yokai Hero
summary: Yokai Hero will tests your skills. At the same time, the world itself tells a story on its own. Every level feels realistic, and you truly feel the high stakes that your character is dealing with every step of the way. That helps add a lot of excitement, but also challenge to the game as a whole.

name: Your Future 2 Future Prediction
summary: All the mysteries that have not been revealed will be solved.

name: You Have 10 Seconds 3
summary: The official third installment in the You Have 10 Seconds series! Dodge spikes, lasers and solve puzzles to make it to the exit before time runs out! Over 300 new levels, brand new gameplay mechanics and more!

name: Yorg
summary: Yorg (Yorg's an Open Racing Game) is a free open source racing game developed by Ya2 using Panda3D for Windows, OSX and Linux.

name: Yonenaga Kunio no Shogi Seminar
summary: Shogi master Kunio Yonenaga trains gamers in his style.

name: You Are Here
summary: Have you ever wondered about your place in the cosmos? Well, now with the magic of virtual reality, you can see exactly where you are! Shrink and expand the universe to see where you fit into the big picture. Stroll through a sea of hundreds of thousands of stars and galaxies.

name: Your Star
summary: In the game, you control a young boy who need to explore a strange mansion to find his sister and escape the place. But the house is haunted by Shadows and you have to fight them on your way.

name: You Lose. Good Day, Sir.
summary: a word puzzle game with an angry armadillo

name: Yoshi Deja Vu DS
summary: Yoshi Deja Vu DS is a medium-sized ROM hack of Super Mario 64 DS. This hack features 5 Main Courses and 5 Side Courses.

name: Yokaze
summary: Yokaze is an indie game label that takes you to new worlds full of emotion.

name: You Are the Dinner
summary: "You Are The Dinner" is an immersive action rougelike game where you can feel the psychology of a young soldier trying to fulfill his duties in a city full of zombies and try to keep him alive. But it's no easy task with millions of zombies pouring in on you.

name: You Are What You Eat
summary:
You Are What You Eat is a fast-paced, frantic top-down action game in which you must fight through densely-packed levels, killing enemies and taking over their bodies.

Every time you defeat an enemy, you become them -- weaknesses and all. You must learn to constantly adapt to new play styles and craft strategies to survive as the game gets more and more difficult.

name: Your Highness, we should defend! 2
summary: A tower defense game from Amamori Lab.

name: You Love Him
summary: A story about being in love with the wrong person.

name: You Are Not a Banana: Better Edition
summary: You Are Not a Banana is set in everyday life and has a sprinkle of imagination and humor. The audiovisuals seek to evoke nostalgia for the 80s and 90s. This short form experimental game unfolds as a sequence of thought provoking events and surprises. This game also comes with a free catchy chiptune soundtrack.

name: You Are God
summary: Control the weather on a planet. Watch the life grow and develop religion and technology. Will they worship you or forget you?

name: You are the Muncher
summary: You are the muncher an ancient force of evil. Eat as many people as possible.

name: Yodo
summary: A cursed puzzle game with a dice

name: Yolo Space Hacker: Mission Bahamas
summary: Carry out an intrusion test within the Bahamas bank. You will have to sharpen your OSInt skills, prepare a trojan, and carry out targeted phishing to penetrate the bank, and open the safes in all discretion, and in all legality...

name: You Will Not Survive
summary: Awaken Lost Pilgrim, and fight through the Forsaken Lands, where there is only one constant...We Are All Going To Die. Discover the dark truth of the world you have been thrust into as you battle your way through this bullet hell.

name: Your Bum is Talking
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Dogspeed as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles - Enhanced Edition
summary: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles – Enhanced Edition features DualSense wireless controller haptic feedback and speaker support, 4K resolution and 60 frames per second gameplay, and additional player character accessories.

name: You Were Hallucinating the Whole Time
summary: The finest modern game design technique, showcased front and center.

name: YOU ARE MY HOME
summary:
In an unlabeled cartridge, you see footage of your life from angles you've never seen before. Someone's anime drawings tell you that you need to "really real know".

Are you sure you want to?

Made for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 Jam.

name: You are Awake Now
summary: You're waking up at last. What's everyone been up to while you were gone?

name: You-Realm
summary: A college student named Spencer must explore a digital world in You-Realm, a Yume Nikki fan game made for Dream Diary Jam 3.

name: You're Going to Make a Great Mother One Day
summary: "You're going to make a great mother one day," they say to you. A reproductive horror Twine story that features one ending with a bit of interactivity; about a 10-15 minute read.

name: Yoshi Touch & Go
summary: A cancelled game featuring Yoshi for the Nintendo GameCube. It was later reworked into a Nintendo DS title with the same name.

name: You&Me
summary:
You&Me is a Yume Nikki fangame. This game focuses on the connection and mechanics of the dreams, both shared and not shared, between Yarn and Nyla, and how these two sisters influence one-another.

This game was created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam, in celebration of Yume Nikki's 13th anniversary. This is a game that follows a similar structure to Yume Nikki, as you explore through dreams and collect Stuff, but is otherwise a self-contained, original project.

name: Your Love Story
summary: This is a AVG telling a realistic love story, which tells the story through interactive movies. It's about summer, youth memories and growth.

name: You Must Build A Ship
summary: Tenshi has stolen flight from Gensokyo and it's your job to stop her!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Summer Vacation"
summary: New plain clothes costumes that are perfect for summer!

name: You vs. Wild
summary: In this interactive series, you'll make key decisions to help Bear Grylls survive, thrive and complete missions in the harshest environments on Earth.

name: You Got Crabs
summary: Watch your crabs live their lives and force evolutionary changes by altering the environment in this calm, relaxing life simulator

name: You are cursed, Mr.Mayor!
summary: You play as a Mayor of a little village who wants to gather votes in anticipation of the upcoming elections.

name: Yo! Noid 2: Game of a Year Edition
summary: Remastered version of a game jam developed "sequel" to Yo! Noid.

name: Yokai Taiji
summary: Yokai are creatures of different shapes and sizes but with greater power than humans. Yokai Taiji is an adventure game set in Japan. You will take the role of the last hunter of Yokai, who seeks to rescue his grandmother from these beings. Fear not and seal the Yokai.

name: Yo-Yo Shuriken
summary:
Use your secret ninja weapon, the mighty "Yo-Yo Shuriken" to defeat the robot hordes and their deadly bossess. Master the technique of throwing the shuriken to attack enemies from the front and then recalling it to hit them from behind!

Focus your energy into the Yo-Yo Shuriken to deliver a powerful charged attack that can cut through several enemies at once!

* 7 levels of intense action!
* Solo and 2-player co-op modes!

name: Your Way
summary: Your Way is a travel simulator with a conundrum element. Here you can walk through the forest and admire nature.

name: You Have to Play This Game
summary: Explore the world of Celestia in this retro-inspired, top-down action adventure!

name: Yokaiware
summary: Face the scariest Yokai in this cursed collection of 28 fast-paced Microgames, each with a different mechanic, look, and feel!

name: Youtubers Life: Fashion
summary: Youtubers Life is the best selling life simulation/tycoon videogame on iOS. Become the world’s greatest content creator in history by editing videos, expanding the number of fans and turning yourself into a wealthy fellow. With the new Fashion Channel, you can now engage with your audience in fun, new ways. Experience how cool it is to become a top model, taylor every aspect of your personal life or design your own clothes. How long will it take you to be featured on the cover of the most important fashion magazines?

name: Your Best Nightmare
summary: An UNDERTALE Photoshop Flowey battle re-imagining.

name: You Are Not Alone
summary: Coming out as transgender can be harrowing and dangerous. A journey and message.

name: Yokai Rescue
summary: Ascend through a futuristic tower in this fast-paced action platformer. Use your Yokai abilities to move swiftly in the air and pierce through your enemies to defeat them. You are the last Yokai capable of saving your people and liberating your homeland from the Selvo robot control.

name: You Are Bisexual
summary: An interactive, barely-fictionalized memoir about not knowing you are bisexual

name: Your Story
summary: Your Story is a visual novel based in a fantasy world where you're a guide for a half-elf named Lia. She has no friends and can't find her place in this world. Together you will encounter meaningful choices, romances, mystery, and more. Will her story become Your Story?

name: You're My Hero
summary: A hybrid Point & Click adventure and platformer in which players choose from a type of hero and must find and take down the supervillains.

name: You Probably Won't Survive
summary: A zombie survival game in which you probably won't survive...

name: You Must Escape 2
summary: Mobile room escape game "You Must Escape" sequel

name: Yoshi Heardle

A variation of Wordle dedicated to songs from the Yoshi games.

name: Yomo
summary:
Yomo is an oldskool-styled shoot 'em up by Aaron Fothergill for Mandarin Software. It was runner-up in The 1989 Games Writer Of The Year Award competition which is pretty cool. I've had this on my bucket list for a while because I always admired its 8-bit feel which reminded me of games I played as a youngster back in the early 80s.

The world is viewed two-dimensionally with a landscape populated by many destructible buildings and whacky vehicles which use the most frustrating mechanics. Our character is a tiny stickman who's on a mission to recover a dodgy nuke dropped behind enemy lines. However, this won't be easy because the baddies are constantly attacking so why not fire off a few heat-seeking missiles before jumping inside something probably stolen from the 1960s? On foot isn't fun, but if you see other stickmen wobbling across your screen then hit fire and gun 'em down!!

name: Your Turn to Disembark
summary: Your Turn to Disembark is an episodic narrative game about a weird train and the passengers that are trapped inside of it. Will you make it out of the train or will you be trapped onto it's route for the rest of days?

name: You've Got To Be Kidding!
summary: Climb the Tree! Solve real life problems by choosing the best advice.

name: Yoshi's Island PC
summary: Yoshi's Island PC is a fan made 2D platformer based on the Yoshi's Island series that was released on Mario Fan Games Galaxy by Emma Essex in the early 2000s and later rereleased in the Early 2000s FANGAME HELL collection.

name: Yomawari: Night Alone / htol#NiQ: The Firefly Diary - Limited Edition
summary:
A bundle of the limited editions of Yomawari: Night Alone and htol#NiQ: The Firefly Diary, released for the PlayStation Vita.

The limited edition includes the game plus the following:
- Yomawari: Night Alone softcover art book with developer commentary, official art, sketches, and behind-scenes looks at the game (12 pages)
- htol#NiQ: The Firefly Diary Official Art Book with developer commentary, official art sketches, and behind-the-scenes looks at the game (36 pages)
- 18-track OST in a jewel case
- Collector's box

name: Yogi Bear & Friends: The Greed Monster
You Must Mop

One day while he was doing his usual peeking, he saw something he should not have seen. His destiny changes when he learns of a certain secret of the hotel...

name: You Are Not A Banana
summary: You Are Not A Banana is set in everyday life and has a sprinkle of imagination and humor. The audiovisuals (free OST included) seek to evoke nostalgia for the 80s and 90s. This short form experimental game unfolds as a sequence of thought provoking events and surprises.

name: Yoake Mae yori Ruri Iro na
summary:
The story is set in very distant future, in a time when mankind is just recovering from decades of war fought between Earth and a terraformed Moon. The war was so devastating that it set technological progress back by decades if not centuries, which is why the settings don’t look futuristic. Although the world is now at peace, there continues to be distrust between the Sphere Kingdom (Moon) and the Earth Federation. Travel between the two is restricted for diplomatic purposes and confined to a single spaceport on Earth.

So anyway, one day the lunar princess, Feena fam Earthlight, comes to the protagonist’s house for home stay…

name: Yoba
summary: Collect all coins on the level to reach the next one. Avoid the dangers on your way. Just remember, you have only one chance, if you die, you will start again!

name: Your Doodles Are Bugged!
summary:
A magic explosion in the studio of Doodleus, the Master Doodler, has hexed his pet bugs into his doodles. Grab the magic pen and help Doodleus to free them again. Do you have the skill and precision to handle hundreds of bugs at once? Do you have what it takes to be a Master Doodler?

In each level you play through a new doodle to rescue the bugs that have been hexed into it. Sometimes there are lots of them - hundreds of them! The problem is, the bugs have minds of their own and move according to their own rules.

Your goal is to help them reach the magic honey in each doodle. The only help you have is your magic pen, which you use to draw new lines into the doodle, changing the doodle, building roads, bridges and stairs that allow the bugs to reach the honey...

name: Your World According to a Single Word
Yogi's Great Escape
summary:
Another winter has passed; it's time for Yogi to wake and begin his annual hobby of relieving innocent campers of their picnic baskets.

A few days into the season, Ranger Smith receives a disturbing tele-phone call informing him that Jellystone Park must close and all the animals are to be moved to the zoo.

Yogi hears the news and he secretly decides that the only way to avoid being sent to the zoo is to escape from Jellystone Park.

When Yogi goes missing, a tracker and his faithful old dog are brought in to help with the search.

Playing the part of Yogi Bear, you must progress through various scenarios, avoiding obstacles and hidden dangers. If for any reason Yogi slows down, Ranger Smith and the tracker are sure to capture him and take him to the zoo.

name: Yolka
summary: A Game inspired in the saga souls, with an open world to explore and some animals to hunt.

D.I.S.C.O! Turn every level into a platforming party of Playtonic proportions.
Yooka 64! For fans of all things retro this tonic will be a blast from the past! No added polygons.

Welcome to a world unlike ours.

This world is very unusual. It builds from the remains of our own civilization and, in a very odd twist, has many of its people based on characters that have made appearences in YouTube Poops! The world is run by an empire controlled by celebrities in the YTP Community, and its cities based on the ones seen in said poops.

Although the world seems peaceful, it is quite chaotic. I.M. Meen, of all people, has damaged the world's reputation by killing off bronies and making deals with other enemies to take over this fine world! It seems that the world has become a cesspool of sin...

name: Yokai Buster: Ruka no Daibouken
summary: Game developers Sting' were contracted by the publishing comglomerate Kadokawa Shoten for a tie-in game for their gaming magazine Marukatsu Super Famicom, which had recently just started pushing a new mascot named Ruka (with an accompanying mini manga in each issue) to try and help boost sales of the magazine. Rather than create a new game from scratch, Sting opted to re-brand the already existing "The Jetsons: Invasion of the Planet Pirates" game they had released the year before, which had not been released in Japan. The gameplay and level design between the two games is ultimately the same, though the story, sprites, and artwork were completely redone, as well as music.

name: You Are The Road

name: YokeLight

name: YourFigureOut

name: Youda Mystery: The Stanwick Legacy
summary: Uncover your grandfather's secret in Youda Mystery: The Stanwick Legacy, an hidden object puzzle adventure! After inheriting Stanwick Manor, Emma searches the house and discovers that there is a secret to reveal. Finding proof that the house isn’t as abandoned as she was led to believe, Emma must now solve clever puzzles and make her way into locked rooms to discover the truth behind the mansion in Youda Mystery: The Stanwick Legacy!

name: You Experience 365 Days of Being a Girl in This Simulator Game
Yorkshire Gubbins

name: You First
summary: You First is a romance visual novel in which you follow the evolution of the characters throughout three episodes in different years of their lives. A quirky narrator who makes fun of the events will guide you, and you will be able to choose how their love story unfolds at specific times in each episode. Will they dare to tell the truth or a white lie? Will they have sex at home or make plans outside? Interactive decisions in a romantic style suited for singles, couples and dating sim lovers as well.

name: Your_New_Life_Letter.rtf.exe

name: Yogurting
summary: Yogurting was a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. It was set in a modern-day setting with supernatural elements, and focused on the events occurring in the high schools Estiva and So-weol Academy. A mysterious event known as "Endless Vacation" caused teachers and entire schools disappear, and the students must discover who or what stands behind that phenomenon.

name: You'll Stay Here Forever
summary: Proxima Centauri b was discovered on August 24, 2016. The rovers sent to the planet are not responding. It turned out that the planet's atmosphere does not allow radio signals to pass through. You have been sent to the planet's surface to find them.

name: Youso Warriors
summary: Youso Warriors is a brand new trading card game with a unique structure where the 2 players each pit 2 to 3 Warriors in 1 on 1 battles. Your goal is to defeat all of your opponent's Warriors using cards your draw from your Main Deck. Players can collect cards to help build their decks used in battle.

name: You Go Golf
summary: Take a gander through "Wellwishers and Naturelovers Golfcourse". Survey and master the 9 hole course. Encounter the challenges mother nature has for the humble putter. But most of all, have fun!

name: Youkai Poetry
summary: This is a single-line visual novel with modern fantasy theme, with full voice, many original music and CG, bringing you a story like a cool breeze on summer night. It is a story about joy and healing, a story about growing up.

name: You Will Die a Lot Buddy, Trust Me!
summary: A challenging platformer where you have to overcome obstacles. Avoid rays and spikes using the grappling gun. There are checkpoints for each room, so don't be afraid to die. And finally see your rank on the leaderboard at the end of game.

name: You Never Listen
summary: Hayley finds her apartment empty. The love of her life packed and gone. What starts as a search for an answer soon turns into a personal journey. Was her life as perfect as she remembers it ? With each new clue she finds, the truth becomes more and more unbelievable.

name: Young Sherlock: The Legacy of Doyle

name: Yokai Ningen Bem: Aratanaru Tamashii No Meikyuu

name: Yousei Rasutaru-chan to no hibi
summary: "Yousei Rasutaru-chan to no hibi" is a Adventure game created by "R Man 44", released in 2022.

name: Yorumorukimiri: Shippo-tachi no Kizuna
summary: Shippotachi no Kizuna is about a tanuki named Tantanuki who transfers to Deudeu Academy to acquire and learn how to use an angel. However Tantanuki and their friends are dragged into the academy's fight against the mysterious being Douke Neko/Jester Cat.

name: Youda Farmer 2: Save the Village
summary: Stop the Big Boss and save the village! After destroying almost everything on the farm, the Big Boss is out to execute his evil plans! Earn and invest your money wisely to stop this evil maniac from building more hideous parking garages on your beautiful land. Rebuild the farm, collect wood and stone, and grow fantastic crops in Youda Farmer 2: save the village, a fun time management game.

summary: By accident, you broke the seal of the mysterious book, which contains an enormous magical power that allows users to control any Yokai by defeating them and recording their names. This godly power is too much which alerts all the Yokai. You must find your own way to defeat them and survive.

name: Yomi: Expansion Characters
summary: Unlock the 10 expansion characters in Yomi: Quince, Onimaru, Troq, BBB, Menelker, Persephone, Gloria, Gwen, Vendetta, and Zane.

name: Youkai Kori Kassen
summary: Youkai Kori Kassen, also called "Catastrophe War of Fox and Raccoon Dog" by fans, is a Touhou fan game written in Danmakufu by raichu, released in full on 27 March 2013. At first, it resembles a typical Touhou game, but plays more like Fairy Wars.

name: You Don't Know Jack: Movies Expansion
Young Justice Shadow Mission

name: Your Smile Beyond Twilight
summary: Experience the story of a young man.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional Character Pack Vol.2 "Chika & Ruby & You"
summary: Three characters have become playable characters and new! Adventure the mirror world with Chika, Ruby, and You!

name: Yolo Chase
summary: Yolo Chase is the ultimate freeway police chase experience. Race your tricked out ride along a crowded freeway, dodging traffic and evading the popo. Can you be the greatest Yolo Chase hero of all time? Can you outrun the police the next time they try to pull you over? How far can you go? YOLO!

name: You Are King
summary: You Are King is a kind of Strategy surivival game.You need to mass your horde and to conquer other hordes.Finally,You are crowned king.

name: Yoshi's Island: Pacifier Edition

name: You Will (Not) Remain
summary: You must stay in your apartment as the city around you falls to an Eldritch horror.

name: Yohjo Simulator
summary:
This is a little girl simulator.
You control Yagi, a 3rd grade elementary school girl, and wander around town. There's no goal in this game. You need to decide the goal for yourself. It's the same as in life. This is an amazingly realistic simulator.

name: You're Not a Rogue
summary: You're not a rogue, and your rogue isn't here. Still gotta open that door!

name: Yours Truly
summary: Yours Truly is an emotional 3rd person narrative-driven game with elements of exploration, puzzles, and platforming. Centered around Liam who is stranded in a strange world searching for his true self, and purpose while finding a way home.

name: Your Majesty
summary: Enter your name and start your own dynasty. Rule your empire and choose between developing technology or culture, governing diligently or lazily. Through a series of memorials and decisions, you will determine the fate of your nation.

name: Yoake no Mariko 2nd Act
summary: Sequel to Yoake no Mariko on PlayStation 2.

name: Yo-kai Watch Dance: Just Dance Special Edition
summary: A collaboration between Level-5 and Ubisoft, the game is a Yo-kai Watch-themed version of the Just Dance games.

name: Youlogic
summary: Indie logic puzzle game

name: You Are a Skeleton & That Is a Problem
Yon Paradox
summary: Yon Paradox ​is a survival puzzle game where the hardest puzzle is yourself. Set in a cyber dimension, an antimatter-powered time machine broke, causing periodycal time rewinds. You will have to solve riddles to repair the time machine, while avoiding your past alter-egos to not create paradoxes.

name: Your Blight
summary: 'Your Blight' is a turn-based dark fantasy RPG that survives in a city sealed off by the appearance of a vampire. Survive for a limited time of 21 days. Explore the city. Meet the survivors. And uncover the secrets surrounding you and the world.

name: Yon-nin Mahjong

name: You Are A Bird
summary: You Are A Bird is an immersive VR Bird Flight Simulator where your real arms become wings. Flap and angle your wings to explore and hunt in VR. Based on real bird flight mechanics and soaring flight physics.

name: You're Cookin', Good Lookin'!
summary:
You're Cookin', Good Lookin' is a 2D fighting game!

This game was created for Yuri Jam 2022. Mio and Beatriz are a married couple who, despite both being professionals in the cullinary industry, are fighting to decide who's cooking dinner tonight!

name: Your Ball Exploded

The levels are arranged in such a way that victory is not given easily. Only by counting your actions and thinking ahead of time, you can pass this game. Randomly generated events will add an surprise effect to the gameplay.

name: You Had, Like, So Much Going On
summary: You Had, Like, So Much Going On is a game about gender issues.

name: Yoko
summary: Yoko offers a terrifying first-person psychological horror experience. Unravel the sinister mysteries of Saikominami, where spirits impede your exploration, immersing yourself in an immersive journey filled with suspense and horror.

name: You're Not Special

name: Yoru no Kasou
summary:
I walk around.
Sometimes something falls down.
Burn it.
There are 30 △ in total.
It's just a game of exploration.
There is no story.

name: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles - Signature Edition
summary: Unwind and enjoy the slow life in Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles, a relaxing open-world adventure game. Yonder is set in the world of Gemea. A natural island paradise with eight distinct environments ranging from tropical beaches to snow-capped summits. Yonder offers a world to lose yourself in; a world filled with the wonder of discovery and the spirit of adventure.

name: Your Waifu Juice
summary: Fight with the dungeon dwellers and enjoy sex scenes with lovely girls! You have to consistently conquer 5 dungeons of varying difficulty. Defeat opponents, fight terrible bosses, get more and more sophisticated weapons.

name: You Better Run
summary: You Better Run is a fun party online multiplayer indie game for (2-4) players.

name: You Should Eat Breakfast
summary: a game about going to eat breakfast.

name: You Don't Know Jack
summary: The original game in Jellyvision's (later Jackbox Games) comedic trivia series.

name: You are Apt

name: You can't do it alone

name: Your Path of Destruction
summary:
Your Path of Destruction is a Total Conversion for Quake that attempts to recreate the classic Doom games (Doom & Doom II: Hell on Earth, respectively) and act as both a remake and a sequel to the original Doom series.

All of the Monsters and Weapons have been replaced with their Doom counterparts, all of these were remade in 3D. Ranger was replaced with the Doom Marine.

name: Yondu's Journey
summary: Join legendary warrior Yondu in this interactive fmv adventure as he battles for survival in hostile territory. With his cunning, strength, and unwavering spirit, Yondu rises above adversity in this epic tale of survival and adventure. Get ready for an unforgettable journey with Yondu the Fearless!

name: You Find Yourself in a Room
summary: YFYIAR is the drunken uncle of text-based adventures: Abusive, abrasive, and maybe a little funny. Use your keyboard to enter commands. Use your brain to demonstrate that you’re more existentially valuable than a robot with skin.

name: You Are Hope
summary: You Are Hope is a game where the emphasis is on the need to collaborate peacefully with other players in order to survive and evolve. Your task is to rebuild civilization from scratch, together with other players and across countless generations.

name: You, A Man, and A Knife
summary: A game about expectations.

name: Yorisoi Delivery
summary: "Yorisoi Delivery" is an adventure game for lonely nights. It's a game where you call for a "just being there delivery" and spend a late night together. As people gradually gather, the house turns into a hangout spot, allowing you to enjoy a lively and fun night.

name: Youra
summary: "Youra" unfolds as a captivating tale of destiny, elemental powers, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. When Youra and Ichika discover a mysterious key, their lives take an unexpected turn as dark forces descend upon them.

name: You Don't Know Jack: The Irreverent Collection
Yomesou de Yomenai Kanji DS
summary: A DS game that teaches how to write kanji.

name: Yomp for Zhi
summary: Yomp for Zhi is a difficult turn-based RPG with no getting lost or backtracking. It has perma-death, a lot of randomization, 41 characters to hire, and most enemies can become temporary allies.

name: Yokai Moon
summary: A turn-based tower defence game inspired by Japanese folklore.

name: You Deserve a Seat at the Table
summary: You Deserve a Seat at the Table provides players with the right tools to excel in corporate environments. This 2D Puzzle game offers an exciting alternative to common dull approaches. Ordinary business concepts such as Critical Thinking and Problem Solving are taught through interactive mini-games.

name: Yo! Joe! Beat the Ghosts
summary:
Graffiti artists live a hard life. Joe and Nat are always on the run, trying to escape New York's police. When they reach a mysterious castle, there's no way of knowing they're in deep trouble already.

Yo! Joe! Beat the Ghosts is a platform game featuring two characters. The protagonists can jump, crawl, kick, beat, slide, and swim. They are even able to hold their breath when under water. If you are playing the game solely, "Joe" is your character of choice. A friend can take on Nat's part at the same PC.

The game's purpose is to get rid of "Professor X", who is the bad guy. The players can attack opponents using several weapons, including molotovs, chainsaws and nunchakus. Yo! Joe! Beat the Ghosts doesn't offer save games. The copy protection requires the original disk at every start-up.

name: You: The Untold Stories
summary: You: The Untold Stories is an Action Adventure Indie PC Game inspired by classics, like Dynasty Warriors and Tomb Raider. The gameplay includes hack-n-slash sequences and mind-boggling puzzles. And you can import your own pictures to get a version that YOU are the main character.

name: Yorbie
summary: A 3D twin stick shooter where Yorbie the robot must take on the forces of the evil Dr. Zox.

name: You Have My Support
summary: Brought to you by the Lost Ether Crew, You Have My Support is a small collection of 3 unique maps based around slight texture limitations except for anything with a "SUP" prefix. ﻿

name: Yokai Tales: Fox
summary: Yokai Tales: Fox is a deep action RPG that tests your discipline, resilience, and skill in agility and combat. Embody the last Kitsune, on her quest to save spirits from the cruelty of humans. Rebuild their lives, learn unique techniques, and ascend to a Nine-Tailed God.

name: Yoru no Rojiura Annai
summary:
On a winter day near christmas, guide a young girl lost through the back alleys and protect her from thugs and witches.
A visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Your Shots Count
summary: Defeat monsters, protect your village and practice your math skills in Your Shots Count. There's strength in numbers, and you defeat the three different types of enemies by shooting at the correct answer to the math expression above them.

name: Your Future Self
summary: Your Future Self is a thrilling time loop "conversation-em-up" with a unique conversational "battle" mechanic. It harks back to the aesthetics of text-based adventure games whilst deliberately subverting your expectations; both in story and design.

name: Young Justice: Legacy
summary: A port of Young Justice: Legacy for Wii, which was cancelled due to quality issues and low interest from retailers.

name: You Just Died
summary:
You Just Died. In this game you play as Davey. He wakes up in his childhood home, it's different, yet familliar. Where will he end up while wandering through this dreamy interpretation of the afterlife? And will you find out the dark truth about his past?

Keep your eye's open, you won't see everything on the first playthrough...

name: You are Dough
summary:
you are dough

become bread

name: Yoyo
summary:
Yoyo is an arcade adventure in which you play as Yoyo. Because of a hacker you are trapped inside your computer game. You have to collect valves and hopefully make it out.

Aliens and spikes will kill you, but you can avoid death by using your barrier which will kill aliens and remove spikes. Once an alien is dead it stays dead even after you die. Spikes will fully return though.

name: YoYa: Dress Up Princess
summary:
Every girl is born a fashion designer. YoYa: Dress Up Princess arouses in them the talent for creating beauty to magnify their charm.
There are tons of fashion clothes for your to match at will. Be it hairstyle or makeup, clothes or accessories, you can create a special dress room, where you can easily manage princess, models, and elite fashion female.
YoYa series deliver a new costume game experience and richer gameplay to girls, with more varied gorgeous visual feast to constantly amaze players with more surprises.

The iOS version was released in March 2023, but was shortly thereafter delisted without any updates.

name: Your Roar
summary: Roar into your microphone to attack unsuspecting cuties!

name: Your Train 2
summary: You can operate trains more and more with your own train schedule! Train routes all over Japan and Taiwan, with a total of more than 50 routes!

name: Youda Legend: The Curse of the Amsterdam Diamond
summary: Puzzle through the mysteries of Amsterdam to find out more about an old, dark curse that still haunts this beautiful city in the hope of finding a legendary diamond. Use your eagle eyes and common sense to lead you through an exciting adventure passing the Rijksmuseum, the Flower Market and many other famous places like never before. Starting at your hotel, combine clues and solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries that will finally lead you to the greatest diamond you have ever seen!

name: You Can Pet the Dog VR
summary: Fulfill the ultimate fantasy: going outside and petting a dog. In You Can Pet The Dog VR, players can pet and play with an adorable dog in a beautiful environment.

name: You Have No Legs
summary: Control Jack, an archaeology student who lost both his legs during an earthquake while working in Teotihuacan, Mexico. Look for ancient treasures and move around the temple using only his arms!

name: Your Spaceport!
summary: Manage your very own space station in this Tycoon game. Sell fuel and repairs to the visitors. Manufacture and research new ways to defend your business and make more money. Survive against all odds.

name: Yoku-Gami
summary:
Yoku-Gami is a unique, challenging and addictive game. This easy to learn game is from the mind of award winning game designer Dr. Reiner Knizia. The rules are very straight forward so anyone can play, learn, have a blast and exercise their mind.
Join Yoki in this endless fun loving game which is idea for the whole family. Simply clear the numbers from the board and make your next move. Stuck? No worries, just tap Yoki and he will show you the right combination.

name: You have a drunk friend
summary:
What will you play if you have a very drunk friend? A warm hearted angel? Or an evil
bad guy? You may find answer in this fun sim game. Try exploring in the room and
figure out how to sober up your friend!

name: Yoshi no Cookie: Kuruppon Oven de Cookie
summary: Yoshi no Cookie: Kuruppon Oven de Cookie is a cuisine focused re-release of the original Yoshi's Cookie, exclusively for the Super Famicom. While the gameplay is identical, the game also adds cooking advice and recipes concerning the Kuruppon Oven from Panasonic. Only 500 copies were released in Japan, and the game was not available in other territories. It currently fetches a very high price on the Japanese retro game market.

name: You Have to Win the Game
summary: You Have to Win the Game is an free exploration platformer with a retro 1980s PC aesthetic.

name: Yokai Jiken Aratamegata no Kobanashi
summary: A visual novel from Vanadis.

name: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's
summary: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's is an augmented reality mobile game developed by Youtooz. It was released to coincide with the release of Youtooz's Security Breach wave figures.

name: Yokai Inn
summary:
You are forced to take shelter in an abandoned inn, and the place springs to life with otherworldly patrons as soon as the sun sets!

Immerse yourself in unique activities like maintaining the furnace and sweeping floors, or classic ones like farming, fishing, cooking, mining, and crafting in order to grow and expand your inn.

Yokai Inn is a slice-of-life sim game, inspired by titles such as Harvest Moon and Animal Crossing, that is currently in the early stages of development.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Delta Replica"
summary: Cool Scarlet Delta costumes are newly available for Yohane!

name: Your little story: Winter
summary: You were preparing for the New Year celebration, decorating the Christmas tree. But with your bad luck, you've slipped and fallen unconscious... When you came back to yourself, you found an incredibly beautiful person next to yourself.

name: You Feel Normal.
summary: You find yourself stranded along a lonely, abandoned road, desperately seeking help. You stumble upon an old, farm-themed amusement park, you will feel.

name: Yosuke Ide's Mah-jongg School
summary: Yousuke Ide's Mah-jongg School is a cancelled game for the Nintendo 64DD.

name: Yoshi Gone MFGG
summary: A Yoshi game featuring appearances of various MFGG forum members and some of their custom sprites.

name: Yolk Heroes: A Long Tamago
summary: Yolk Heroes is the virtual pet game you've always wanted! RPG Mechanics, minigames, quests...who doesn't love quests? Your elf will explore, grow stronger, and embark on an adventure to deliver the world from evil! OR! You can just relax and enjoy your little friend.

name: Yowasugiru RPG
summary: A freeware Japanese RPG Maker parody game about a weak hero tasked with saving the world from the evil demon king. The game is heavily comedy focused, where the jokes come from how useless the main character is. Part of KSB Games RPG Parody series.

name: Yowamushi Pedal Ashita he no Kou Kaiten
You Are Sick
