summary: Do you like feeling sick? Well, this is the perfect game for you! Feel the thrill of testing your parkour skills as you overcome simulated sickness. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: You Don't Have Time
summary: You Don’t Have Time is a first-person puzzle game taking place in a series of rooms filled with puzzles, will you have time to solve them one by one to discover the reason of your presence?

name: Youda Fisherman
summary: Prove Youda Fisherman praised in books and maintain your universal fame by helping a stranger rebuild his fishing company! Help the stranger face the fears you have once battled and unite with him in your next quest for fame. Use his extraordinary inventions and rule the seas in this electrifying journey and time management game!

name: You're Not Family
summary: A (really short) free narrative rhythm game by Atiya Nova. Attend a family dinner and time your key presses to the flow of conversation. Features lots of familial tension with a dash of misery. And cute bunnies!

name: Yonder: The Cloud Catcher Chronicles - Accessory Pack 1
summary: Glam up your character with this free accessory pack. Who doesn't like to accessorise?! Includes 6x items to customise your character.

name: You Are Horny
summary: Navigate life as a shy guy given a magic pill by a friend to fix romance woes. Meet women, tackle pill side effects, and aid your buddy in love dilemmas. A comedic journey of love and friendship awaits!

name: Yogurt!
summary: Yogurt! is an animated erotic clicker game where the goal is to collect as many girls as possible.

name: Yo! Noid 2
summary: Game jam developed "sequel" to Yo! Noid.

name: You Are Not Immune to Lava
summary: You Are Not Immune To Lava is the first game created by developer Nanoco1000. It is an intensely difficult, minimalist, 2D platformer with a difficulty much akin to games like Super Meat Boy or VVVVVV.

name: Youmu Konpaku & Dungeon of Lewd Creatures
summary: Getting into a hideout of creatures that aim at cute girls, Youmu-chan tries to escape in this side-scroller ACT game!

name: YourToy and Dying: Reborn Horror Game Bundle
summary:
Here comes two of our most popular horror titles, includes exculsively content for Xbox players.

Feel a more intense 3D first person experience in this bundle, discover and observe the exquisite items, use them wisely to escape these horrible nightmares.

name: You Don't Know the Half of It: Fins of the Father
summary: Welcome to the big race, Salmontha; the same race that ended your father 7 years ago. Are you ready?

name: Young Mage
summary: Skeletons are attacking nearby castle, catch them through the portal and assign to mine ore in your tower! Use collected materials to defend the castle and Craft better equipment for your workers! Help villagers to unveil evil behind the skeletons ambush!

name: You Are A Chat AI
summary: "You are a chat AI" is a simulation game. No real AI is used, and the player pretends to be a chat AI and converses with NPCs. This game consists of two parts: "conversation" and "learning". The appeal of the game is that players who normally use AI can experience being used on the other hand.

name: Your planet in 60 seconds
summary: Your planet in 60 seconds is a deck and world building game on different and beautiful planets all over the universe.

name: You Will Never Get This Achievement
summary:
Don't even try it. You won't succeed. You will never get the last achievement.
I really like buttons.

name: Youth Feather
summary: ——我给你钱，你给我一个电竞战队！大小姐杨海遥挥舞钞票，将我拉入电子竞技的世界。电竞题材文字冒险游戏《青羽》，我和美少女电竞选手的传奇故事就此开始！

name: Youko to Anata
summary: Eroge game developed by OPC Soft.

name: Youda Fairy
summary: The wise old forest wizard has provided a watchful eye over the kingdom for over 1000 years. This epic battle between the forces of good and evil is as old as time itself, but now the kingdom is danger. The Forest Wizard must leave the kingdom and he is now seeking a replacement. He wants you to become the new forest wizard and guard the kingdom against the wicked enchantments and spells of the evil witch in Youda Fairy, a spectacular action-arcade game.

name: Yomawari: Midnight Shadows - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Yomawari: Midnight Shadows
- Artbook
- Novel

name: YouCanDoIt?
summary: Try to clear the game How to play is simple. You can move the chicken to the target point. Drag with the mouse to jump the chicken. Feel the annoyance starting from scratch Sometimes you can get angry while playing this game.

name: You Will Die
summary: A twin stick shooter where the enemies get progressively more deadly

name: You Are Here
summary: You Are Here is a horror mod for Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas, developed by a group of professional modellers, scripters, and designers. This mod aims to provide an unforgettable gaming experience, drawing inspiration from games like The Suffering, Silent Hill, and Resident Evil.

name: You Cans Do It!
summary: Play as cans! Defeat bottles!

name: You Can Talk to People
summary: You Can Talk To People is a simple and compact small-talk simulator. If you think that sounds awful and boring, you are correct. If you think that sounds like the coolest thing to grace our great blue earth, you are also correct.

name: You May
summary: You May is a Yume Nikki fangame. The game follows a young girl called Yarn as she explores her dreams to rediscover her past and find the items most important to her.

name: Your Time Is Mine
summary: An adventure game from ADOOM.

name: YOLO Life: The Beggining
summary: A minimalist puzzle-platformer with an odd name.

name: You Are a Wizard
summary:
You Are a Wizard is a Commodore 64-esque fever dream about one of those wizards you see airbrushed on the sides of vans.

You are that wizard.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional Character Pack vol.1 "Dia & Hanamaru & Kanan"
summary: Three characters have become playable characters and new! Let's adventure in the mirror world with Dia, Hanamaru and Kanan!

name: YoyoMonkeyAdventure
summary: “悠悠猴大冒险”是一款多人平台合作游戏。相互配合，不断移动，为了取得的圣雪莲前进！

name: Your Earth
summary: This game is an earth creation simulation game that allows you to create and view the earth in various shapes.

name: Young Team Sounds
summary: Break the dead ends! A music creation adventure where the sounds you create change depending on your "emotional choices". A dark tale of creation, modelled on the real world and real events.

name: Youda Legend: The Golden Bird of Paradise
summary: After your trip to Amsterdam, the time has come for a relaxing holiday in Youda Legend: The Golden Bird of Paradise! It all seems peaceful, but again the journey will be nothing like you expected it to be. The tropical environments will bring you more than a relaxing time and cocktails at the beach as your hidden object skills are tested. Questions rise and irreversible decisions have to be made to finally reveal the mystery of The Golden Bird of Paradise!

name: Your City in 3D
summary: Get any city on the planet like it in the game and explore it.

name: Yoga Wii
summary: Yoga Wii is a fitness video game for the Wii home console, developed by Indian studio Trine Games and published by JoWooD Entertainment. The practitioners can monitor and dynamically track their progress. Set up an individual schedule and be guided by Anja and a Guru.

name: Youtubers Clicker
summary: Youtubers clicker is a game where you goal is to create your own partner company, combine all the tubers and earn the maximum number of subscribers.

name: YouTube Snake
summary: YouTube Snake was an easter egg game in the YouTube video play that was first included in July 2010, however has since been removed. The game was a playable version of the game Snake and was accessible by pressing up when a video was buffering.

name: YonDelver
summary: YonDelver is a roguelike bullet-hell hack n' slash. With no stone left unturned on the surface, corporations fight over the rights to massive sinkholes known as "Delves". Team up with players and build up an arsenal before taking on the terrors that sleep deep under the clouds within the delve.

name: Yoshinoya
summary: Restaurant simulation/action game, licensed by the Japanese Yoshinoya "beef bowl" chain. You play as an employee, taking and fulfilling orders behind the counter, which involves pushing buttons according to what dishes people order.

name: Your Journey of Survival
summary: Your Journey of Survival is an open world, sandbox game, mixing together the best elements of FPS, Survival, Tower Defense, and RPG games.

name: Yogi Bear
summary: The 100th Anniversary of Jellystone Park is fast approaching - and land developers want to shut it down! Based on Warner Bros. Studios live-action CG animated feature film Yogi Bear, Yogi Bear: The Video Game lets players become "smarter than the average bear" while exploring the park as Yogi. Belly slide, zip-line, bungee, and sneak through majestic levels, all the while rescuing protected animals and finding a way to save Jellystone Park from shutting down forever!

name: Yorumorukimiri
summary: You transfer to a certain school. But it's a creepy school where none of the students speak. The only word the student say is the enigmatic "Yorumorukimiri". Together with your partner Ketia the journey to solve the mystery of "Yorumorukimiri" begins.

name: Yomas
summary: Yomas - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. As you progress through the game, you will encounter new weapons, potions, and coins. All this is required to destroy enemies and bosses!

name: You are a slave!
summary: You are a slave! is a first-person adventure. In this game you are taken into slavery. For fear of death, you decide to escape from the castle with the help of your new friend. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to escape from the castle.

name: Your Time to Shine: Island Existence
summary:
Light-hearted spinoff of Your Turn to Die: Death Game by Majority.

Twelve people wake up on a deserted island with no idea of how they got there. They get told by the Island Master, Sue Miley, that they're on the Isle of Memories and they must survive there for 30 days before they can be released. With no other choice, the twelve agree to cooperate with each other, build shelter, forage, and fight monsters while getting to know one another.

name: Yokai City
summary: Walk the streets of a 1980s Tokyo where humans and yokai live uneasily side-by-side, trying to keep the peace between them in a tale full of love and hate, life and death.

name: You Are a Torpedo AI
summary: Navigate a torpedo in environments filled with obstacles and DESTROY YOUR TARGET.

name: You Brought a Shield to a Tentacle Fight
summary: Bullet hell but you only have a shield.

name: Yoshi's Racing Story
summary: Yoshi's Racing Story is a ROM hack/mod of Diddy Kong Racing which adds Yoshi as a playable character and also new levels based on the Yoshi franchise.

name: Youngblood: Search and Destroy
summary: Youngblood: Search and Destroy is an isometric action game that was originally scheduled for being published for PC and Sony PlayStation in November 1997. However, the PC version has been postponed to May 1998 while the PlayStation version was pushed back to an undisclosed date.

name: Yopaz Icestar
summary:
This puzzle game features 40 levels in 3 worlds & a Level Editor !

You play as a little character named Yopaz and you must collect all the stars in the universe, but the vacuum of space forces you to slide indefinitely when you run in one direction.
Only an ice wall will stop you in your tracks! With this unusual constraint, you will need to collect all stars on each level.

The world "Advanced" provides additional features for hardcore players.
You will be able to change your color and collect stars of the corresponding color! Your color will also allow you to go through teleports, direction changers, or even protect you from enemies!

The Level Editor allow you to unleash your imagination and creates dozens of custom levels !

name: Yorkshire's Great Race
summary:
Welcome to the Yorkshire’s Great Race!
Take on 4 international riders for a chance to win the championship for Great Britain and team Leeds Bradford Airport.
Experience familiar locations in the beautiful Yorkshire countryside recreated in stunning local watercolour-inspired paintings, and get a clear overview of the course with the classic top down view.

name: Yo' Bro
summary: Ratz attack! Ratz attack! The city of Los Angeles is being invaded! Only Lil Bro', Camp California's rad skateboarding dude, can save it. The evil Ratz gang is unleashing a barrage of killer creatures and devices. Find incredibly cool weapons to fight back. Wipe out their earthquake machines and nasty man-eating plants with rockets and grenades. Fight off wicked space aliens and launch your bonus attacks. It'll take everything you've got to send the Ratz packing!

name: You Are Undead
summary: You didn't survive the zombie apocalypse and now you are a brain eater undead feeding on the last remnants of humanity. You will use freaking creepy mutations and lurk among the shadows to hunt your prey. There is a brief tutorial, but it's up to you to discover the special abilities of the infected ones.

name: Yo-Kai Watch Wibble Wobble
summary: Yo-Kai Watch Wibble Wobble is a mobile puzzle Yo-Kai game for Android and iOS. It's the international version of Yo-kai Watch: PuniPuni and was discontinued in 2018.

name: You Do Voodoo
summary: A Doom II map based around various applications of voodoo dolls. This map contains destructable walls, Quake style walk-on lifts, automatic crushing doors, combination lock with multiple codes randomised for each new playthrough and an item vending machine using rockets as currency﻿.

name: You are the Apple of My Eye
summary:
A group of college students, who just have finished their study, are about to meet more in society.
They are brave to face them. They have dreams.
But still there are so many trifles out of their control and give them headache, especially referring to affections.

name: You Are Kaiju
summary: Welcome to You are Kaiju. A rampage vr game where you the player will destroy cities to get a good score. Be careful though. There are tanks that will try to lower your score. Have fun by breathing fire and firing plasma beams from your hands.

name: Yogventures 2: Electric Boogaloo
summary: Help Lewis, Simon, Ben and Bouphe deliver Zoeys gifts to the other Yogs

name: You Have 10 Seconds: 2023
summary: A fast paced platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given 10 seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying. 25 areas with unique level design mechanics to learn.

name: You Want to Watch the World Burn
summary: YWTWTWB is a fast-paced puzzle in which you are an arsonist burning locations and landmarks to the ground. Balance risk versus reward with the amount of havoc you can cause while staying alive!

name: Your Journey Begins
summary: A 5 level episode for Heretic.

name: You, Me, and the Cubes
summary: Brainchild of the mad genius Kenji Eno, You, Me, and the Cubes is a game of balance and physics. It's a puzzle game where the correct solution will change as you play it, forcing you to react to what you've done and to what's about to happen.

name: Your Majesty
summary: Your Majesty is an innovative project that combines RPG with music. In this game the fantasy world which players are in is on the verge of complete destruction. Players will become the helper of the King of Queen who are suddenly transported to this world and will embark on an adventure-themed around "Justice" and "Madness".

name: You Are the Ref
summary: Soccer trivia app for iOS and PS Mobile based on the British comic strip.

name: You are Grounded!
summary: It´s 1997, Haddonfield, Illinois. You are trapped in the basement. Father is upstairs. He has been drinking all day. He wants to come down to give you a lesson. Do you have the guts to survive?

name: You get Eaten by a Cute Milf
summary: to kiss a bunch of cute girls in her belly

name: Yogurt: Wet Dreams
summary: Yogurt: Wet Dreams! - a clicker with a lot of beautiful girls! You must collect all the girls, for this you need to bring them to the peak with your clicks! Each girl is animated, voiced and emotional!

name: You Will Travel No More
summary: Stay a while. Stay forever. Won't you come outside?

name: Your little story: Valentine's Day
summary: Love is such a silly feeling. Can you really live for it? Why would you die for it? Empty words... But what if someone's life can really depend on your love?

name: Your courier is on their way!
summary: Why does your courier always show late?

name: You are Never Alone
summary: A horror maze game with the purpose to escape. Lost in a maze that is oddly familiar, you must remember how to escape without them finding you. Avoid "them" while you collect your memories to get out without being followed.

name: Youxing Continent
summary: Youxing Continent "is a fantasy style open world massively multiplayer online role-playing game, where the world economy is completely driven by players. It features a novel and interesting build equipment system, excellent social interaction, and exciting PVP and PVE.

name: Your Friendly Neighborhood Vampire Detective
summary: Can you solve the murder you committed?

name: You Game+
summary:
The popular "YOU Game" is upgraded!
Let’s combine "YOU" and "YOU" to create a BIG "YOU"!!

name: Youda Survivor
summary: Survive like a real Robinson Crusoe after stranding on the funniest and most mysterious island! Depend on some basic tools and the local wildlife to survive. Find out how to escape this island while you fight off angry pirates and work together with an exotic native tribe under the scorching sun. Prove that you have what it takes to survive anywhere and under any circumstance.

name: Yoga Bear
summary: A gay crush and an existential crisis.

name: You Draw I Puzzle
summary: "You Draw I Puzzle" is an interesting drawing Mosaic casual play, you can drag the graphics fragment to spell out the complete picture, can also draw the work that you like, cut into interesting fragments, let other players challenge your imaginative design. Have a good time!

name: Yousei
summary: For the past few years, Kangai has been a wanderer, but his return to his hometown has triggered a series of deaths linked to his past. He joins a group of psychic teenagers who solve mysteries under the watchful eye of the government. In Yousei, he and his group are sent undercover to a local university where they must dig up the remains of a top secret experiment. Upon arrival, they discover the project lead missing, and an old acquaintance racing them for the same information.

name: You Are Not Bunnygirl
summary: You Are NOT Bunnygirl is an RPG about self-care! Manage Physical and Emotional Health as you guide Bunnygirl through a lab of malfunctioning robots. You can't actually lose, because it's a game, but you should protect Bunnygirl anyways because she might not appreciate it if you don't.

name: Yogoe Hunter
summary:
Embark on a roguelike text adventure game journey through Eastern legends!
Intense battles with mythical creatures recorded in history and a variety of choices leading to multiple endings await you.

name: You Are A Pilot
summary: You Are A Pilot is a 2D arcade simulator of a pilot who drives jet-powered flying car. The controls are based on physics. Deliver various goods, drive livestock on a farm, or defend the earth from alien invaders.

name: Yoomp!
summary: Yoomp! is an 8-bit Atari action game. Bounce the ball through 23 three-dimensional textured tubes, collect as many points as you can and try not to fall off the edge!

name: You Are the Wormhole
summary: A game about jerky aliens and loneliness. Part personality test, part text adventure.

name: Yo! Ninjia
summary: Run, jump and shoot. Yo! Ninjia is a fast-paced action game offering unique and impressive gameplay experiences. Players must navigate traps, defeat enemies, and customize their ninja with various outfits. With a rhythm-based challenge and social sharing features, it’s a game of skill, luck, and style.

name: You Are Mine2 Otome Love Story
You Versus 27 Elves
summary: Fight your way through 27 unique elves in a journey that will bring you happiness, to your wits' end, and maybe even to tears. As you learn more about these thankless slaves who now wish to conquer the Earth, there's only one question you need to ask yourself: Will you be the hero the world needs?

name: You Are Being Followed
summary: You Are Being Followed explores the perspective of Emma, a blind woman wrestling with the unknown. Emma is joined by her aging guide dog turned emotional support animal, Samuel, as the foundation of their relationship is called into question. A brief, audio-driven game exclusively for PlayStation VR, the title focuses on tone and exists largely as a mood piece.

name: You Sunk
summary: You are captain of a submarine on a secret mission behind enemy lines.

name: Yogurting Pop!
summary: A world full of block popping, puzzle centric madness.

name: Your Girl
summary: Manage your girlfriend: Put on, undress, change. Do anything. All this in the game Your Girl!

name: Yoshi vs. Windows Platinum
summary: Yoshi vs. Windows Platinum is a remake of the Yoshi VS Windows. It has new and improved levels, graphics and gameplay.

name: You Doesn't Exist
summary:
Set out on an adventure that challenges all the codes of the RPG genre, toying with its boundaries to create something unlike anything you've ever seen.
In a world full of magic and adventure, a young boy starts his apprenticeship to become a knight...

name: You have to go to work
summary: A game about going to work.

name: Your Principal
summary: Do you see that old guy shouting and screaming? that's you the principal Being a Principal is not an easy task. you can be the meanest, sourest principal in history or not.

name: Yomotsu
summary: A transport that sets out at dusk and arrives at midnight. A world above. A world below. Yomotsu is the thin line that connects the two.

name: You're Gonna Miss the Bus!
summary: Henry is running late for school. Again.

name: Yoga Master: Deluxe Edition
summary:
With the Yoga Master Deluxe Edition Bundle, you can get the full experience relaxing and catering to your psychophysical well-being!

In addition to the Yoga Master basic game package, you will find the full DLC Meditation Studio for your meditation sessions and the DLC Magic Atmosphere and Dream Fantasy, including new and incredible landscapes and fantastic fresh music tracks.

name: Young Detectives: Holidays
summary: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Yoli
summary: A satisfying shooting game with 4 gameplay modes and simple controls! Upgrade your character and defend the Portal from the creatures of the void.

name: You Are the Inch Valley Captive
summary: "You Are the Inch Valley Captive" is a single-player Quake map, designed as an adventure where the player will tumble through the dangers of multiple dungeons in a non-linear quest to escape the Inch Valley.

name: Your Spider
summary: Your Spider is a 1st/3rd person horror game. Solve unique puzzles and work together with your spider to defeat formidable monsters, which do not like humans or spiders.

name: You're the OS!
summary:
Do you sometimes get frustrated at how slow your computer's operating system can be? Now is your chance to prove that you could do a better job!

Behold the nerdiest game ever, in which YOU are the operating system! As such, you have to manage the computer's processes, memory and input/output events, and try not to get rebooted by an impatient user. Good luck!

name: You and Me
summary: A short puzzle RPG-Maker Game made with washitape graphics. This was made in a week.

name: You Just Don't Get Stars Like These Back Home
summary: Explore a campground and night and try to find the darkest spot, so you can see the most stars in the sky.

name: Your Turn to Die: Death Game by Majority
summary: Your Turn To Die: Death Game By Majority is a multi-ending horror adventure game. Your decision will directly affect the story and final outcome!

name: Yogi's Big Clean Up
summary: A licenced Yogi Bear game all about clearing Jellystone Park of litter and fixing various things.

name: Your Last Xmas
summary: The house formerly belonged to a singer who had some success in the 1980s as part of a duo, singing about tropical holidays and whatnot, before going solo and achieving greater success with his newfound freedom. There were always the rumors however - that he may have been connected a series of gruesome cannibalistic murders. He passed away a few years back, but some say he returns every December 25th - and Last Christmas, he ate people's hearts...

name: You Green Elephant
summary: You Green Elephant - a classic retro first-person shooter, filled with references, banter and thrash in every pixel of the exciting action.

name: Your Own Reality
summary: First person game based on making decisions. During gameplay you will have to choose between good and evil. Every decision will change your story which may not be as easy as you think. Only you can decide which way to go. On your way you will meet many people who will try to provoke you, but it's up to you whether you keep cool or make the wrong decision under pressure. Some decisions are really hard but there's no escape.

name: Your wife
summary: You have been set a curse, and your looks are growing old very fast.You visit a master, who points you to a very dangerous path. You need to go to the four magic worlds to find the antidote to the curse, in which live many fierc

name: Yodoyabashi Oyasama Club
summary:
The regular meeting of Kansai's famous "Yodoyabashi Ojousama Club" is about to begin! Fashionable and elegant ladies meeting together! Bursting with femininity, they will dye the mansion bright red!

Will you be able to make it to tea time... alive?

name: You're Gonna Miss the Bus!
summary:
Henry is running late for school ... again.

YGMTB is an endless runner where you play as a kid trying to make it to the bus on time. Jump, double jump, and slide your way past delivery bots, tree branches, couches, cats, drones, bollards, garden gnomes (non-feral) and myriad other obstacles.

name: You Draw, I Guess
summary: An online pictionary game of drawing and guessing. The game has 4 modes and supports up to 10 players in a group. You can select a prompt and draw a picture for other players to guess. You can also guess on others' drawings. Time to test your drawing and guessing skills!

name: Yotsunoha ~A Journey of Sincerity~
summary:
This PlayStation 2 release removes the erotic content, but adds new CG events. The game focuses on four female protagonists and features the story that plays in pre-determined order of selection. The four female protagonists were reunited after being separated for three years during the closure of the academy they were all attending together. They soon find out that the time capsule they buried prior to going separate ways have been dug up and instead, they find a note saying that their former teacher took it and buried it someplace else. The four of them decide to find that time capsule.

The visual novel element of gameplay is regular, consists of reading on-screen text with occasional choices and top-down navigation through the map of the school campus. After the original PC game, but before this PS2 port, the game also branched into OVA series and manga series.

name: Your Shape: Fitness Evolved
summary: Introducing Your Shape: Fitness Evolved, a revolutionary fitness game for Kinect on Xbox 360. Your Shape's proprietary player projection technology puts your body into the game for the ultimate experience. You'll control the game intuitively with your voice and body as you create your desired fitness experience. Choose a personal trainer to help you meet your specific fitness goals, take a Yoga or Martial Arts class, or play fun, family-friendly mini-games. As you exercise, you'll receive specific feedback on your every move, thanks to the game's real-time precise tracking system. Plus, as you exercise, you'll interact with captivating visual effects that respond to your movement and impact. Get ready to experience the evolution of fitness gaming.

name: Yokai Yashiki
summary: In Youkai Yashiki, you control a boy armed with a flashlight who must explore five stages and locate five talisman before locating and gaining access to a stage boss. The flashlight serves as a weapon against the monsters which inhabit each stage. Your life meter takes the form of a set of batteries. As your life diminishes, the batteries drain and the power of your flashlight, that is the distance that the beams can travel, decreases.

name: Yoyozo
summary: Use your space yoyo to collect stars with style.

name: You're Fired
summary: You're Fired is a game where you shape the future of people, deciding whether to dismiss them!

name: You Are Bugs
summary: You Are Bugs is a team-based multiplayer PvP game. Work together as Prey bugs to find and collect enough food to survive. Or play as a Predator bug and eat the others to survive.

name: Yogi Bear
summary: Embark on a wild adventure as Yogi Bear, the beloved park mascot of Jellystone Park! Gather delicious picnic baskets as you journey through the park, using your quick reflexes and cunning wit to outsmart your opponents. With a variety of exciting gameplay mechanics, including jumping, pounding, gliding, skateboarding, and zip-lining, you'll need to think fast and act faster to succeed. Plus, unleash your creativity through fun mini-games to craft one-of-a-kind gadgets that will give you the edge you need to triumph over your foes. Get ready for a thrilling ride filled with laughter and excitement!

name: You're a Dad
summary: Be a responsible adult, make dinner and take care of your child. You must do this. Nothing else. Choose your path and accept the consequences in this sleep deprived text adventure where everything is totally fine.

name: You Don't Know Jack
summary:
Turn your PlayStation game console into a party! With original music, blistering humor, and a sarcastic host, You Don't Know Jack whisks you from the green room to prime time at a pace so fast it'll make your head spin. Get the question right and score some cash; get it wrong and pay the price. 
 
Ready? Put your knowledge to the test and your ego on the line. You Don't Know Jack is the quiz show party game where high culture and pop-culture collide.

name: Your Quest 2
summary: Gather resources. Build a village and protect your people. Give them jobs to become self sufficient, and arm them to survive the attacks of hungry predators. Explore what lurks beneath the surface, and hope you have prepared well enough to survive it. This is your quest.

name: You are next
summary: "You are next" is a murder mystery for Virtual Reality. Gather your detective instinct and identify the killer!

name: Young Detectives: Undersea
summary: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Youtubers Life: Gaming Channel
summary: Youtubers Life is the ultimate life simulation/tycoon videogame in which you can effortfully become the world’s greatest gaming video blogger in history by editing videos, expanding the amount of fans and turning yourself into a wealthy fellow.

name: You Are Not the Hero
summary:
You Are Not The Hero is a 2D Action Platform RPG that ditches the battle system to focus on richer RPG gameplay elements. Instead of playing a traditional hero that saves the world, you're playing a bystander swept into the affairs of heroes and villains alike.

You play as Petula, an unemployed, emotionally charged, ill-tempered, otherwise average young woman. With the royal army hot on their heels, the heroes have made their way to your village where they begin scavenging for supplies in everyone's homes. After you confront them for stealing your pendant, they rush off to continue their quest, giving you a quest of your own to retrieve it.

name: You Don't Know Jack Headrush
summary: Forget everything you know about a You Don't Know Jack game because YDKJ’s horribly deformed, mutant offspring Headrush has been birthed! Twisted animation, insane question types, and a bizarre appetite for all human excretory fluids and gassed add up to the most over-the-top YDKJ game ever! Fire this game up and stand back, because this is not your Mommy and Daddy’s 'You Don't Know Jack'!

name: Your Friend Hana
summary: You don't know what do to? Just ask Hana! You can chat with Hana, ask her any question and as an oracle she will answer you. Enter specific keywords and she will tell you different stories!

name: You Don't Know Jack: Question Pack
summary:
An expansion for the original You Don't Know Jack. 
It was bundled with the base game for You Don't Know Jack XL in 1996 which was released on Steam as You Don't Know Jack Vol.1 XL in 2013

name: You are a skeleton
summary: Klik, click, klak: This is a tiny game about being a skeleton!

name: Yoshi Topsy-Turvy
summary:
In Yoshi Topsy-Turvy, Yoshi Island has been turned into a picture book. Yoshi will not stand for this outlandish attempt at flattening his world, and he heads off on an adventure to return things back to their original state. To help in on his quest, a group of spirits who like to surprise people give Yoshi the ability to rotate the world to his liking. The big catch with Yoshi Topsy-Turvy is its use of a motion sensor, similar to the one set to be featured in the second Wario Ware GBA game. The game cartridge includes a built in motion sensor which detects how you move the GBA system. By turning the system, you make the world rotate. A meter on the upper right corner of the screen shows which way the system is being held at any time. Rotate the system to help Yoshi stay on the path and make it past perils and through the varied stages.
Go full tilt! By tilting your Game Boy Advance, you'll tilt the environment around Yoshi, knocking over enemies, swinging pendulums, and letting Yoshi run up walls and leap huge pits! Will this ending be happy? All of Yoshi's Island is trapped in a storybook, and only by meeting the challenges of each chapter will you succeed. Collect coins, defeat enemies, or race for the finish to satisfy each course's conditions

name: Young Dilbert Hi-Tech Hijinks
summary: An educational puzzle game based on the Dilbert comic series.

name: You Have 1 HP
summary: A 32-level megawad full of bite-sized combat puzzles & challenges (and GZDoom gimmicks). As the title suggests, you have only 1 HP. Kill all enemies to progress. ﻿All the levels are designed to be beatable in under a minute, with the majority being beatable in under 30 seconds.

name: Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi II
summary: Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi II ("Mitsuteru Yokoyama's Romance of the Three Kingdoms II") is a strategy game and the sequel to the original Yokoyama Mitsuteru Sangokushi. Both games were adapted from the eponymous manga artist's graphic novel adaptation of the ancient Chinese novel. Specifically, they were based on an anime adaptation of the manga, released close to the same time.

name: Yojigen no Ie: 4 Dimension House
summary: Adventure game created by Prosumer in 1983.

name: You Can Do!mino
summary: Is this a puzzle or a simulation? I can't define the genre of the game. Clear the stage in various ways. Use different special dominoes and play the game with objects.

name: Yokubou Lock: Boku no Kanojo wa Shasei Kanrinin
summary:
The main character, Tsukasa, confesses his feelings to Tsubomi, the girl he fell in love with at first sight. Surprisingly, the answer was OK. Tsukasa was happy to have found the lover of his dreams, but...

Tsubomi is such an incredibly caring person. And I'm grateful, but... things just keep escalating and she keeps craving my semen.

name: Yoshida Koumuten
summary: Yoshida Koumuten a.k.a. Yoshida Builder is the first in the line of 3 shoot'em up editors and the only one only able to make vertical levels. Developed and published by MSX Magazine. Yoshida Koumuten Data Library All 3 Volumes are game collections that hold several different shoot-em-up games.

name: You're My Penguin
summary: Help Jun, a self described "chronic over-thinker" make decisions at his new school with friends, conflicts, and romance in this Shounen-ai, anime style, coming of age story! This game offers a visual gallery with over 35 art to unlock, beautiful scenery, music, visual effects, and sound effects!

name: You Know My Name?
summary: A short visual novel about finding your name and a girl in the fog.

name: Your Quest
summary: Your Quest is a casual 2D Strategy/RPG with progressive gameplay where you gather resources to construct a village, craft new weapons and armor, and try to survive the depths of a procedurally generated dungeon under the surface.

name: Yozakura Wizard VR
summary: Yozakura Wizard is a Japanese style VR stealth action game based on Onmouji. With Japan dominated by demons and spirits, you have to protect the land by defeating the evil using a variety of weapons.

name: Youmenkiden
summary: A side-scrolling action platformer in the style of NES/Famicom games. Play as high school student Zankirou Tougi as he is whisked away into a world where he must do battle against fearsome youkai.

name: Youmais
summary: A single-screen maze action game developed for the Famicom Disk System by Taito.

name: You Have 293 Keys
summary: You Have 293 Keys was made over the course of 24 hours. It features:

name: You Don't Know Jack vol. 6 The Lost Gold
summary: Don’t overlook this lost gem! It’s a tasty morsel of trivia that we found under the couch back in the early 2000s, and now we’re pulling it right back out from under that same, dust-mite filled couch!

name: Yoshi Tanks
summary: In Yoshi Tanks, the aim of the game is to take out all of your opponent tanks, whether they are your friends, or AI controlled.

name: Yoshi's Egg Toss
summary: Yoshi's Egg Toss was a Nintendo-published online Flash advergame promoting the release of Yoshi's Island DS on the Nintendo DS. It could be played either at the official microsite of Yoshi's Island DS or at the Nintendo Arcade, a section on nintendo.com that contained promotional web games.

name: Yourself!Fitness
summary:
Six unique fitness environments - Keep your workouts fresh by doing them in the Empress' Dojo, the Alpine Retreat, an Island Paradise, the Urban Oasis, the Desert Springs Resort or a Meditation Garden.

Over 500 unique exercises to choose from - work through sessions with Yoga, Pilates, Cardio Fitness, Strength Training and more.

Customized meal planning with over 4,500 recipes, preparation instructions and shopping lists to make eating right more simple.

Dynamic fitness routines respond to your progress and commitment level.

Maya helps you integrate the fitness equipment you already own into your workout.

name: You Still Won't Make It
summary:
You Still Won't Make It is a challenging instant-death platformer developed by Vetra Games, the sequel to You Probably Won't Make It. The game includes three 'worlds', each containing 18 levels, as well as the 18 'classic' levels from You Probably Won't Make it, recreated for the new game.

The player controls a small black creature through levels that fit without scrolling on the screen. Levels are unlocked by completing previous levels, but can be replayed at any time afterwards. The game has no plot, and new concepts in-game are introduced through specific levels and not explicitly.

Levels are made difficult through the usage and placement of obstacles - mostly spikes - which all kill the player immediately upon contact (and shred the creature into bones and gibs). Most obstacles are static, requiring only accuracy in movement and careful jumps, but several include interactive objects or moving platforms - or, in one of the few concessions to the player, checkpoints. Levels are not timed, and there is no scoring, but the game displays a continual tally of the player's deaths throughout the levels.

name: You Don't Know Jack: Mock 2
summary: Mock 2 brings 800 new trivia questions to challenge your wits.

name: You Have to Burn the Rope
summary: In this incredibly short action-platformer, intended as a subtle parody of Portal, the player must defeat a massive, seemingly invulnerable boss... but how?

name: Your Lucky Charm
summary: Your Lucky Charm is a yuri comedy dating sim about finding luck (and love) in unexpected places.

name: You, With Me: A Kinetic Novel
summary:
You, With Me is set mainly in Singapore of an expat couple who had the perfect plan, a perfect getaway for the holidays. However, everything is turned into dust as news come out of the main character's illness.

Truly, will pretending that everything is normal give you a sense of normalcy? Or perhaps, confronting your fears is the best thing to do?

name: YoukaiMaki
summary: The blood moon has risen once again, meaning the yōkai (cryptids) have emerged from the murky depths of the sea. As the heir to the family restaurant, use your fishing and cooking skills to serve up some delicious yōkai sushi!

name: You Did It Faster Before
summary: A physics filled parkour speedrun through the clouds

name: Yogi Bear's Gold Rush
summary: Yogi Bear's Goldrush is an Action game, developed by Entertainment Int and published by GameTek, which was released in 1994.

name: You... and who else?
summary:
YOU... and who else? is an addictive Strategy game developed by Aldorlea Games.
Recruit troops, improve your skills, conquer castles and progressively unite the world under one banner.
Your ability to come up with a good tactic will be tested!

name: You Are Dead
summary: Find magic weapons and abracadabra your way through colorful domains and their challenging bosses in this roguelite twin-stick shooter.

name: You Go Boom
summary: Are you a true gamer? Do you have what it takes to prove your skills across a variety of simplistic mini games? Test your skills against Jeb's collection of homemade arcade games. But be warned, you'll get no help from him, not even instructions for how to play his silly games.

name: Your Personal Chill Apartment
summary: Your Personal Chill Apartment is a relaxing music indie game with designing and customizing your personal apartment elements.

name: You Gay?
summary: Do not get into gay prison, run at any cost.

name: You are now Possessed
summary: A puzzle game where you're not always in control.

name: Your Shape Fitness Evolved 2013
summary: Your Shape Fitness Evolved 2013 is a leading-edge fitness product that will help you set and achieve your goals in an engaging and motivating fashion. Connect online with friends to compete and collaborate your way to fitness.

name: You're in Space and Everyone Wants You Dead
summary: Run and jump through different gravity fields to escape monsters and get the highscore! Use your psychic powers to grab boxes, bombs, and the monsters themselves to defend yourself! A single touch by an enemy will lead to your demise!

name: You Are a Whale Part 1
summary: You Are A Whale Also Part 1 is the spiritual successor to You Are A Whale. Become a whale, live the life of the mighty being in a very serious absolutely realistic game is definitely meant to simulate what actual whale life is like. Whales.

name: You Can't Fuck on an Empty Stomach
summary: With several muscle studs, you'll have sensual and naughty experiences.

name: You Don't Know Jack: Offline
summary: You Don't Know Jack: Offline is the 5th volume in the You Don't Know Jack Series. Most of its questions were taken from the You Don't Know Jack NetShow that ran from 1996 to 2000.

name: You Are Alone
summary: Take back her husband from the mafia and destroy the invention A story about revenge The game is a third person perspective, action, mission system, shooting game, different types of enemies, and different missions at each level The game is 3 level

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Forever U & I"
summary:
The costume "Forever U & I" includes the following elements:

・ Costume "Forever U & I"
Yohane costume I wore when singing Forever U & I
Wear a beautiful costume like a starry sky and adventure in the mirror face!

name: You Struck Gold
summary: Stranded on a mining planet, your escape hinges on quarrying gold. Solve challenging puzzles by using unique card abilities to uncover riches and escape in this strategic, card-based puzzle game!

name: Your Financial Story
summary: A No-Nonsense Finance Game about Personal Finance, Money Management, & Budgeting

name: You vs. Wild: Out Cold
summary: After a plane crash leaves Bear with amnesia, he must make choices to save the missing pilot and survive in this high-stakes interactive adventure.

name: Your Otherworldly Harem
summary: The use of religious explanation, to explain the origin of ghosts in anime. The soul is immortal, the monster in the anime, is a well-designed body, can accurately trap the soul, the reason why the monster is hard and fast, is because the body good use of the energy of the trapped soul.

name: Yoake no Mariko
summary: This PlayStation 2 release is a voice acting simulator that allows you to play with a microphone or with a controller, which turns the gameplay into a more rhythm-game-like experience.

name: Yosou Shin Karon
summary: Yosou Shin Karon is a Sports game, developed and published by Media Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Your World, 50 Years From Now
summary: A short story of resistance set in a near, dystopian future.

name: Yoshi's Island DS
summary: Yoshi's Island DS is a 2D platformer for the Nintendo DS in the Yoshi's Island series. It is the sequel to Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island, where Kamek and the Toadies have kidnapped all the babies in the world in search for the star children, a group of seven babies who possess powerful stars in their hearts. While the game is heavily derivative from Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island, including general gameplay, themes, and graphics, the game primarily differentiates itself from its predecessor by taking advantage of the Nintendo DS's dual screen to display levels while introducing multiple babies to carry on Yoshi's back, who all have special abilities that are required to complete levels.

name: You Found the Grappling Hook
summary: The player explores a cave using a grappling hook and later acquires a pair of hover boots and an axe for mining gold.

name: Your Sword Is So Big
summary: Your Sword Is So Big is an emotional fantasy game. The detailed appearance of the character, a deep combat system and sensual animations will not let you get bored, and the beauty of the local castles and landscapes takes your breath away!

name: Yo-kai Watch Busters 2: Hihou Densetsu Banbaraya Magnum
summary: One of the 2 versions of Yo-Kai Watch Busters 2. The player controls a team of up to four Yo-kai, who explore the fictitious Karakuri Island in search of treasure.

name: You're Under Arrest
summary: Taiho Shichau zo is a police-themed adventure base on the manga and anime with the same title. The player takes on a role of a 24-year old rookie police officer who just graduated. The game starts with you coming to your new place at work, and the moment you arrive, a small incident occurs and you get misunderstood for a thief. After situation gets resolved, you get introduced into your new place of work and meet your colleagues, among others the two heroines from manga and anime TV series, Natsumi Tsujimoto and Miyuki Kobayakawa. The game consists of two gameplay elements. Adventure mode which resembles a typical visual novel style with fully voiced dialogues for all but the main character, and animated portraits of characters currently speaking, as well as action choices during dialogues. Patrol mode features a patrol map of town where the player, along with Natsumi and Miyuki, is performing routine patrol work which may trigger an event scene or one of the mini-games. The points are also awarded for various different elements during patrol work.

name: Yolo Space Hacker: Mission Forensic
summary: You want to discover Forensic: the art of collecting information on computer equipment? Well, C4ptA1n entrusts you with the pentest of RedPill's warehouses. Be ready to rummage in bins, analyse files, usb drives, network captures... Sharpen your tools!

name: Yoshi Touch & Go
summary: Yoshi and Baby Mario are back together at long last, and it'll take a steady hand to guide them through their latest adventure. As Yoshi charges across the island, you use the stylus to throw eggs at enemies, lead him to egg-replenishing fruit, and make him jump over danger. On vertical-scrolling levels, you use the stylus to draw clouds to encircle enemies, throw coins, and guide Baby Mario through the dangerous skies. Take on the single-player challenges or compete against a friend using the wireless link of the Nintendo DS.
developers: Nintendo EAD Software Development Group No.4

name: Yokozuna Monogatari
summary:
Yokozuna Monogatari is a Sports game, published by KSS, which was released in Japan in 1994.

Yokozuna Monogatari is a sumo game for the Super Famicom. It focuses on management aspects, training sumo wrestlers and setting up bouts to improve their ranking. Earning money from sumo matches allows the player to hire stronger wrestlers, who naturally ask for more money to be recruited. The goal is to train a sumo wrestler to Yokozuna ("Grand Champion") level.

name: Yogi Bear's Math Adventures
summary: An educational game featuring Yogi Bear.

name: Yoshi's Isle: Sonic Style
summary: After two hard years of fast paced running, Yoshi has finally arrived alongside with speedy Sonic. Remember, it's not all about speed though. It's about air! You'll have to clear large gaps to stop Eggman this time around.

name: Yomawari: Night Alone - Limited Edition
summary:
A young girl is walking her dog Poro around town at dusk when a tragic accident forces her to return home with only Poro's leash in hand. The girl's sister commands her to stay home while she goes out to search for the dog. Time passes. Growing impatient, the little girl goes out to search for her sister and dog. But when she steps out she realizes the town isn't the same. The darkness has made it unfamiliar, and now she must search for her dog and sister while avoiding spirits who are stalking her.

Yomawari is an adventure game where you must explore the streets at night looking for your lost dog and sister while trying to avoid all that lurks in the dark.

name: You or the Blue.
summary:
The protagonist, who has lost her parents and grandmother, was taken in by her uncle, her only remaining family.
Emotionally unstable and unable to accept the death of her family, she's swept into complicated relationships with the boys she meets at the school she transfers to.

name: Yocchan to Chie Asobi
summary: Yocchan to Chie Asobi is a SoundLink game released for the Satellaview. It is a game in which Ken and his sister Yo-chan solve an intelligence test quiz. In the meantime, it seems that a puppet show with songs and voices was broadcast.

name: Yo-kai Watch 1 Smartphone
summary:
Yo-kai Watch centers on a boy who gets a special watch that lets him befriend and help mischievous Yo-kai and later summon them to fight other Yo-kai. Players can overcome challenges and help various characters solve everyday problems with the help of Yo-kai friends. These eccentric Yo-kai resemble anything from inanimate objects to mythical creatures.

Yo-Kai Watch 1 Smartphone is a port of the original Nintendo 3DS game for Android and iOS.

name: Yogi's Frustration
summary: Yogi's Frustration is a unreleased game from 1983 about Yogi Bear who is put to work on the Jellystone Park conveyer belt. Your goal was to help BooBoo get picnic baskets of goodies up to Yogi to keep him working fast.

name: Yoshi's Island: Kamek's Revenge
summary:
Yoshi's Island: Kamek's Revenge, commonly referred to as Kamek's Revenge or YIKR, is a Yoshi's Island hack by S.N.N. The original version was released on September 29, 2007. It was inspired by the bonus level 5 of the same name from the original game.

In late 2016 BTD6_maker took over the project, releasing version 2.0 with a completed Extra 5 and various other fixes in March of 2017. The most recent release of Kamek's Revenge was on February 06, 2018.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - Costume "Lucky Outfit"
summary:
The costume "Lucky Outfit" includes the following elements.

・ Costume "Lucky Outfit"
Yohane clothes worn during the girls' association
Wear your favorite clothes that Yohane worn in the girls -only gathering and adventure in the mirror world!

name: You Are Being Watched
summary:
It was just another ordinary day on the country road leading you back home. Who would have thought how a small coincidence can turn your life on the path of unnatural events…

Look for supplies, store them in your inventory, explore all the rooms, solve puzzles, unlock areas of the map, interact, and try to collect everything you find.

Experience survival horror like never before and remember - You are being watched.

name: You're Fired! Revenge!
summary: Office Destruction Simulation Game "You're Fired! Revenge!" Fired from your job, you destroy the Office into a mess to get revenge.

name: Yorbie: Episode 1 - Payback's a Bolt
summary: Play as Yorbie and fight your way through an all-out bot onslaught with epic boss battles in this fast-paced 3d action adventure. Upgrade your weapons and enhance them with stacking bonuses to suit your playing style. Try out as many combinations as you like with the ability to re-customize weapons at any time in the weapon store. Scavenge components and bonuses from enemy bots, or even steal them from other players when they're not looking. Hey, who said life was fair?

name: Yokai Tantei Chima Chima
summary: Youkai Tantei Chima Chima is an arcade game similar to Pac-Man. In this game players will control a cyclops called Chima Chima who will fight against ghosts. In order to defeat the ghosts, Chima Chima shoots bouncing fireballs. These fireballs move together with the protagonist and can kill him so players will need to avoid enemies and have the fireballs explode next to them.

name: Yomi 2: Renegades
summary: Includes two new characters (Troq and River), two new gems (Orange and Diamond), and the ability to play any of the unlockable "wacky rulesets" from Career Mode in online friend matches.

name: You Must be 18 or Older to Enter
summary: It's the 1990s. You're alone at home, and you heard about this thing called porn at school. You Must be 18 or Older to Enter blurs several genres together to create an anxious horror experience, one that hits a little too close. How deep will you dive before your parents come home? Do you even like this stuff?

name: You You N Music
summary: Rhythm game or rhythm action is a genre of music-themed action video game that challenges

name: Yogurt Royale
summary: Control a slime in a multiplayer pvp platformer and be the first to catch all the bananas

name: You are standing in a cave...
summary: A game written by Caroline Berg for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Yoru no Umi de Otsukisama wo Tsuru
summary:
Yoru no Umi de Otsukisama wo Tsuru is a freeware story-heavy adventure/RPG made in RPG Maker 2000.

Starting with Yoru no Umi the games are even more heavily story based with virtually no combat. It has the highest amount of endings based on choices you made throughout the story and which girl you pick for your love interest. Just like in TK3 you can choose between a male or female protagonist - the game more or less becomes a yuri harem if you play as a girl.

name: Young Thor
summary: Have you ever dreamed of walking on a magnificent world with the feeling that nothing can stop you because of your power, of what you are? You are the young and mighty god of thunder and the fate of the universe is in your hand. Yggdrasil, the world tree, is dying. The three Norns, Skuld, Urd and Verdandi are missing and no one is tending the world tree.

name: Yoostar 2: In the Movies
summary: Everyone now has the opportunity to become a global movie star with Yoostar 2. In an instant you can step into the shoes of famous characters from hundreds of movies, play out the part and then share your performance with the world.

name: You Deserve
summary: You Deserve is an horror indie game in which you will experience a bullying story about revenge, starring a teenager called Amy who is lost in a world that she doesn’t know and her only objective is to escape from it without getting murdered.

name: Yokai Tamer
summary:
"Yokai Tamer" is a super popular Japanese MMOARPG game with a competitive style of play, an original fantasy story, along with a beautiful Japanese style. The sound of this game is filled by famous Japanese actresses and voice actors to give you a pleasant experience while playing.

This title was re-released under multiple different names:
- Duelo Ninja [BR]
- Scroll of Onmyoji: Sakura & Sword [Indonesia]

name: You Pilot a Piece of S***: Gaiden
summary: You Pilot A Piece Of S***: GAIDEN is an in-depth examination of the turn-key stagnation most inherent in today's post-modern societal constructs...?

name: You Know The Drill
summary: An action-puzzle game about a wannabe spelunker digging deep inside dangerous grounds.

name: Your Chronicle
summary: "Let's begin your own story." This is a text-based idle RPG game. There are 1,500+ actions here. It's still growing.

name: Your Majesty
summary: Rule a kingdom where every decision can build an empire or seal your fate.

name: Youka and Her Summer
summary: Youka woke up from her dream, but her heart was filled with unease: it was the same home as usual, but it had become incredibly strange due to the nightmare. She couldn't remember exactly what had happened, but it seemed that the reality before her wasn't so "real."

name: Yozora Rhapsody
summary: Sorata Hoshikawa just got a promotion at his work. Perfect opportunity to spend an unforgettable vacation on a tropical island with his pretty wife Kotoko and his cute daughter Hotaru!

name: Yo My Yo!
summary: Yo My Yo! is a simplistic 2D racing game, in which the player must avoid collisions on the road during a given time.

name: Yoshi Racing
summary:
Yoshi Racing is a rejected pitch for a 3D game in the Yoshi franchise. The game was revealed in an article by Eurogamer detailing Argonaut Games' involvement in the development of Star Fox where the game was described as a 3D platformer and left unnamed, while a message board post by an Argonaut employee named the game "Yoshi Racing" and described it as a character racing game.

Following their successful collaboration with Nintendo on Star Fox, British game developer Argonaut Games pitched a 3D game starring Yoshi and made a prototype for it. However, Nintendo did not follow on the offer, with one Argonaut employee speculating this was because the company did not want to let third-parties use its characters. Following this setback, Argonaut decided to retool the prototype as an original IP, Croc: Legend of the Gobbos.

name: Young Wife Elf's Netorase RPG: Irena
Yo-kai Watch 3
summary:
Yo-Kai Watch 3 is the international release of which contains all available content from the 3 Japanese versions of the game.

Follow two parallel stories and unravel the mysteries behind strange sightings while meeting over 600 Yo-kai and using the new 3x3 grid battle system to strategically dish out or dodge attacks.

name: Young Detectives: Animals
summary: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: You Shall Not Jump: PC Master Race Edition
summary: You Shall Not Jump is a roguelike put into a good old tower climber. At first sight it's all plain and simple: you jump and shoot. But in reality…

name: You Can Kana
summary: Learn and master the japanese phonetic alphabets at your own pace with this meditative language learning tool.

name: Yoake
summary: Yoake, originally called Yume 3kki, is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Otetsuki, a young girl. The overall mechanics of the game stay pretty traditional in terms of fangames. You can also play a minigame called "Dieing!!".

name: Youkai Douchuuki
summary: The player controls a boy named Tarosuke, who travels through "Jigoku" (the Japanese concept of Hell) fighting off "youkai" (mythical Japanese monsters) on his way to his final fate, as determined by Buddha. He destroys his enemies by firing small Ki bullets, which can be charged to increase their power; however, if overcharged, he is left unable to move or fight for a few seconds. During boss battles, Tarosuke kneels at a shrine to Buddha and prays, summoning "Monmotaro" (not to be confused with "Momotarou"), a spirit which floats in the air and drops energy balls on the boss and any lackeys he has. Once the boss is defeated, Tarosuke goes to the next stage.

name: Yoshi no Panepon
summary: The Japanese port of the Game Boy version of Tetris Attack, which had the Tetris license removed (the same thing happened with its Satellaview counterpart, BS Yoshi no Panepon).

name: Yori's Journey: Forgotten Origins
summary: Unleash your skills and face your foes, go to the end and survive the experiment.

name: Yoru, Tomosu
summary: In Kagurahara Jogakuen, which has been around since the Taisho era, it is said that there was a secret exchange among the girls called "Pseudo Sisters". It is a special relationship in which the girls would exchange their most important possessions and sign a contract to become sisters until graduation.

name: Yolo Space Hacker
summary: Welcome to our ethical hacker's organisation: we will teach you how to use actual hacker tools (terminal, proxy, reverse shells...) to scan the network, crack passwords, bypass server security and solve the mystery of the Bikini-72 space station.

name: Yoshi's Cookie
summary:
The SNES version of the game has the same form of VS mode and Action mode as its predecessor. However, there are some notable differences available between the old and new versions. First, the graphics are vastly improved, and infused with rich colors that make the game much more aesthetically pleasing than the early versions of the game. The design for Yoshi is another important difference, evolving from his NES incarnation into one that is more similar to the one seen in Yoshi's Island.

The SNES version has an additional puzzle mode where players have to clear the game board in a limited number of moves. There are 100 unique puzzles in this mode.

name: You and I and the Long, Long Drive
summary: Idle talk between a pair of people on a road trip to Pluto.

name: Your Holy & Virtuous Heretic
summary: A first-person, turn-based journey into the occult. Who will stand with Aleister at the end of days?

name: You've Got a Stew Going!
summary: Your friend has invited you over for stew. He has not bothered to procure most of the ingredients.

name: Yoshi, the Web Pet
summary: Yoshi, The Web Pet was a Flash game on the Yoshi's Story website. It was a virtual pet game where the user could raise their own pet Yoshi.

name: Young Detectives: Farm
summary: Dive into a world of colorful discovery with the ultimate spot the difference game designed for young minds! Your mission is to identify the subtle distinctions between seemingly identical scenes.

name: Youmandriver
summary: Do you know how to drive a fast car on open roads and a lot of traffic ? With realistic vehicle physics, traffic density and roads ? Realistic roads are designed for legal speed, not to let a gamer be 80% of the time full throttle driving a 500 HP car...

name: Yoiks!
summary: Humorously introducing computer programming and spatial reasoning skills, Yoiks! provides students with an off-beat learning environment where they explore 30 activities of increasing difficulty that typify core concepts of computer programming. Yoiks! engages students in the scientific process of observation, hypotheses formation, and experimentation to apply logical constructs as they solve problems. With Yoiks! in your mathematics and technology curriculum your students will: build logical reasoning and critical thinking skills, develop algebraic thinking skills, intuitively prepare for programming, develop strategies and solution plans, and collaborate to solve problems.

name: Your Human is Sick
summary: Your Human is sick and it's up to you, a naive T Cell, to solve puzzles, fight off bacteria and viruses, and learn about the immune system. Make your human healthy again in this dungeon crawler adventure!

name: Yoshi Click and Go
summary: Click to shoot, and click Yoshi to jump!

name: You and Not You
summary: It's time you get to know YANY: who you are and who you aren't. Take a short journey through your self and discover what kind of entity you might be.

name: Yo-Jin-Bo: Unmei no Freude
summary: Yo-Jin-Bo: Unmei no Freude is a port of Yo-Jin-Bo for Playstation 2. It adds an alternate Good ending for Tainojo (Bo) and added 2 routes for Harumoto and Kasumimaru.

name: Yogventures!
summary: Yogventures! was to be the first game being developed by Winterkewl Games LLC., in partnership with the European YouTube group the Yogscast. It was ultimately cancelled, amidst minor controversy.

name: Your Study Mate
summary: If we both get into North University, we can achieve happiness! Of course, if we both pass the lawyer exam, that's not a bad option either (laughs). What's in front of you is such a companion-oriented focus game.

name: You and Me and Her: A Love Story
summary: You and Me and Her: A Love Story is the visual novel medium in its purest form. Will Shinichi choose Miyuki, the beautiful queen bee of the school, or the endearingly awkward misfit Aoi? With art by Tsuji Santa, these beautifully rendered romances will stay with you forever.

name: Your Wings My Wings
summary: A visual novel about a girl who chooses to love and be loved instead of being haunted.

name: Youda Farmer
summary: Experience true country life when you run your farm, grow your crops and see your business grow as you provide all shops in town with self made farm products! Grow wheat, tomatoes, potatoes and grapes while you take care of your cattle and catch fish. New machinery will help you increase productivity and take care of the farm animals. Will you spend your hard earned money on new crops, a chicken coop or will you build a stable for your sheep?

name: Yorumorukimiri: Hajimari no Shoujo
summary: A cat, adorned with a guitar and a sword. The calls who calls himself a "demon", gazes at the universe. The demon observes a girl swiftly passing through the twinkling stars. The girl, racing through the cosmos, is known as the "Girl of The Beginning". This marks the concluding tale surrounding the mysterious dog and Yorumorukimiri.

name: Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker
summary:
Yobarai Detective: Miasma Breaker is an every-direction action shooter that emphasizes the exhilaration of defeating waves of enemy hordes.

The game uses a quest-based structure in which you clear quests, earn rewards, and use them to strengthen your characters for the next mission.

Skilfully dispose of the enemies coming at you from every direction and enjoy building up your characters.

name: Youtuber Survivors
summary: Youtuber Survivors is a 2D action roguelike game where players can easily execute exhilarating combos with simple button controls and customize their own combos.

name: Yo! Noid 4: Episode 3
summary:
The Noid is back in the long-awaited final episode of Yo Noid 4.

The Noid, and his Sidekick Pepe the Pepperoni, journey to Pepe's home planet: The Domino's Pizza Planet, to save it from enslavement from an insane Hatsune Miku who is threatening to put pineapple on every pizza.

This game is pulled from a world where Domino's Pizza's mascot "The Noid" became the hit platforming sensation rather than Sonic the Hedgehog. Including having Yo! Noid 4 having it's third episode released!

name: Yozemi no Center Shoujun Series: Eigo-hen
summary: Yozemi no Center Shoujun Series: Eigo Hen is an English learning game designed specifically for Japanese students, focusing on helping players improve their hearing and speaking skills in English. The game contains rich English vocabulary and grammar topics, as well as real English conversation recordings, allowing players to learn English in an interactive game environment. In addition, the game also provides a variety of learning models and challenge levels to help players gradually improve their English level. Whether they are beginners or players with a certain English foundation, they can use this game to enhance their English skills. if you have any other questions, feel free to ask.

name: Yo Frankie!
summary: Yo Frankie! is an open source video game based on the universe and characters of the free film produced in 2008, Big Buck Bunny.

name: You're Gonna Die 1000 Times (Or So)
summary:
You have been accused of endangering the lives of 1000 people. As punishment, you will be cloned and killed 1000 times.

Can one version of you escape prison, using nothing but a match and whatever items you find around?

name: Young Merlin
summary: After trying to rescue a drowning young woman, the the hero of Young Merlin is drawn into a fantasy world which is threatened by the evil Shadow King. Naturally, it is your job to save this world and also to rescue the aforementioned woman who has been kidnapped by the Shadow King. This is done in typical action adventure fashion: you have to fight enemies using spells that are gathered during the progress of the game as well as solve puzzles and use several objects. What sets Young Merlin apart from other action adventures is the fact that there is no text in the entire game, instead, icons are used to represent conversations, furthermore, the game uses passwords,instead of a battery to record the players progress.

name: You Must Become A Lich
summary: Become a powerful Lich in this Coin Pusher RPG. Push Coins, Collect Prizes, Build An Army and Take over the World!

name: Yojimbrawl
summary:
From the makers of Genital Jousting and Broforce comes a deadly serious local multiplayer samurai fighting game that recalls classic gameplay, where split second decision making and quick reflexes are the key to victory while the slightest misstep could lead to your demise. Set in a bleak, blood-splattered landscape where hope lives and dies by the sword, you and up to three combatants will fight to death and beyond. Master complex combos and gain newfound power with each reincarnation.

Yojimbrawl is a local 2 player fighting game originally prototyped during a Ludum Dare game jam in March 2014. Free Lives spent another few months developing it further for Humble Bundle Monthly December 2016.

name: Yoshi's New Island
summary: Yoshi and Baby Mario are back in Yoshi's New Island, the third installment in the beloved franchise. The series' fun game-play mechanics such as Yoshi's Flutter Jump, Ground Pound and Egg Throw return, but now Yoshi knows a ton of new tricks too. Yoshi gets to bash and thrash his environment by throwing around Mega Eggdozers and Metal Eggdozers. Yoshi also can transform into a variety of objects, such as a jackhammer or a submarine, both of which can be manipulated using the Nintendo 3DS gyro controls. A certain type of star even transforms him into Super Yoshi, giving him the ability to fly through the sky or run along walls and ceilings. Players who are having trouble completing a level might see the appearance of Flutter Wings, which let Yoshi fly through the air.

name: Yo-kai Watch Blasters: Red Cat Corps
summary:
"YO-KAI WATCH is back and more action-packed than ever, as YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS: Red Cat Corps and White Dog Squad are coming to Nintendo 3DS family systems!

Players can team up with up to three other friends either locally or online to fight towering Big Bosses, using skills and powerful Soultimate Moves. While previous YO-KAI WATCH games focused on turn-based battles, YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS drops you into real-time skirmishes, in the first ever action RPG for the series.

During these battles, you directly control your Yo-kai as you strategise with different skills and equipment to defeat huge bosses. By taking on various fast-paced missions, players will embark on a journey to meet, befriend and battle more than 400 new and returning Yo-kai.

Each of the two versions of the game – YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS: White Dog Squad or YO-KAI WATCH BLASTERS: Red Cat Corps – contains different Yo-kai, missions and bosses. By trading between the two, you can collect all the Yo-kai!

By linking save data from YO-KAI WATCH 2: Bony Spirits, YO-KAI WATCH 2: Fleshy Souls or YO-KAI WATCH 2: Psychic Specters, you can get one of three special Yo-kai to take into battle."

name: Youdanji
summary: Coffee-break rogue-like themed after Japanese folklore tales.

name: Yosuga no Sora
summary: The censored port for Yosuga no Sora.

name: Your Dry Delight
summary: Set in 1920s Prohibition-era America, this romantic comedy follows Detective Richter and his adventures as he attempts to unravel Cleveland's liquor industry.

name: YoHoHo.io
summary: Open chests and collect doubloons to get bigger. Kill your opponents to collect their booty. Avoid the toxic fog and be the last one to survive on the not-so-desert island.

name: You Suck at Parking
summary: Drive, drift, and park in You Suck at Parking, the simple and accessible yet challenging game where parking is more important than your driving skills. Collect cars, learn new mechanics, challenge the world, and customize your ride in this ever-evolving parking simulator.

name: Yogi Bear in Yogi Bear's Goldrush
summary:
Yogi Bear has to save Jellystone National Park from an evil ghost named Jake; who stole the funds needed to keep the park operating. There are six different stages in the game that range from a large city to the Wild West. There are no-powerups in the traditional sense; players must collect 100 picnic baskets for an extra life. Hidden doors and areas must be found in order to crack open the safes. Once inside a safe, Yogi must collect 25 gold coins to make a bar. In order to unlock the best ending, Yogi needs to convert 300 gold coins into 12 gold bars that will provide the park with the money to continue operations.

The player has the ability to jump on most enemies to kill them, just like in Super Mario Bros..Some enemies must be left alone due to the lack of ability to wield a weapon. Falling down into bottomless pits or navigating into dangerous hazards will cause Yogi to lose a life. By default, the player gets three lives and one additional continue.

It was planned to be released in November of 1994.

name: You Must
summary: In the social network, the main character plays the quest "Hide and Seek", but this time the organizers decided to move the quest to the real world. They indicate the coordinates of the place where the quest item was hidden, the one who finds it first will receive a cash prize.
